channel.title: World Renowned Psychic Medium, Healer & Spiritual Teacher, Christopher Reburn | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: Don't miss one of the highest rated spiritual/psychic talk shows on Blogtalkradio as popular worldwide respected psychic medium, healer and spiritual teacher Christopher Reburn explores a new spiritual, psychic, new age or metaphysical topic each week! Christopher Reburn has an impressive twenty year-plus track record of accuracy. For years, Christopher has helped thousands of people worldwide with his indepth, accurate psychic readings and spiritual guidance. Christopher is on a mission direct from God to help everyone who needs his invaluable psychic insights, powerful healings and making contact with The Other Side. While Christopher maintains a hectic reading and personal appearances schedule, he remains one of the most compassionate and accessible psychics to anyone, anywhere.

item.title: Connecting with your Spirit Guide with Christopher Reburn - Jun 12,2012
item.description:
Listen as I share some proven techniques on how you can connect and communicate with your own Spirit Guides. Our guides join us on The Other Side long before we ever take our first breath of air on this earth plane, and I would love to share with you some stories about Spirit Guides, what they do for us and how to better your connection with them! Spirit Guides is my #1 requested topic on this show and its a topic that Im most passionate about. Be sure to tune into this show for some updated information on Spirit Guides and more! Visit Christopher online at http://www.reburn.org On Twitter http://www.twitter.com/chrisreburn On Facebook http://www.facebook.com/christopher.reburn

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES AUTHOR ANDREA HYLEN - May 01,2012
item.description:
As a transformational life coach, author, Minister of Spiritual Peacemaking, speaker, conscious parent, and grief transformation guide, Andrea Hylen had seen how grief, trauma and loss had lowered the voices or silenced teenage girls and women. Their spirits had been crushed and they had lost confidence and hope. As a spiritual lightworker, Andrea knew she had to do something! Her recently published book, Fearless Voices: True Stories by Courageous Women, is an inspiring journey of hope and discovery for women of all ages and backgrounds as they uncover their own strength while sharing their personal stories to help others. Andrea shares her own story, along with several compiled stories from fearless and courageous women all over the world, so that you may see your situation and your life in a new light; helping you to find the courage to move past the obstacles that are standing in your way, giving you a new found strength to step into your greatness. Dont miss a powerful show and learn some important ways on how you can unleash your fearless and courage side!

item.title: EveryDay LightWorker: Karla Shields - Apr 16,2012
item.description:
APRIL 2012 LIGHTWORKER SPOTLIGHT KARLA SHIELDS Spiritual Healer, Psychic Medium & LightWorker Karlas spiritual mission is simple: On lifes journey there are times when we truly feel the need to find answers. Karla knows this from a deep and personal level and is inspired by the Light to help and heal. However, Karlas spiritual & lifes journey has been far from easy. Regaining her strength in her spirituality following the greatest loss and darkest hour of her life, Karla uses her God-gifted psychic and spiritual abilities to help people all over the world deal with and define their personal troubles, and gives her clients a real sense of inner truth and balance with each reading and healing she does. Her healings & readings have brought a sense of peace and closure to many people the world over who have utilized her gifts firsthand. Karla is very passionate about her work, and her general love for people and their welfare shines through in her powerful spiritual teachings.

item.title: EveryDay LightWorker: 'Apothecary Jeri' Hemerlein - Mar 06,2012
item.description:
APOTHECARY JERI Spiritual Healer, Health & Wellness Advocate, Bee Supporter & Alternative Health Care Provider Jeri Hemerlein, known to her legion of followers as Apothecary Jeri, lives by a simple philosophy Enhance and expand your energy bodies and its been her life mission to help others heal with her proven techniques and alternative healing remedies for years. In her own words Im what I like to call a "doula" for flowers and other energies that are infused in water by forces of nature under the direction and guidance of Spirit. Jeri comes from a long line of healers in her family and is now living out alot of her grandmothers own spiritual desires in helping to heal others. She is the Founder, Director and home to Heirloom Remedy Nature Essences and works in dedicated service to Spirit and Nature to bring you energy in a bottle which incorporate the various Nature Essences (Flower, Earthen, and Elemental) and specific elixirs which address particular issues that need attention. Jeri also works closely with the bee population and is a big supporter of bee welfare and shell share with us the current status of the bees which is so very important for all of us know and learn more about! Jeri made her Conversations debut in February 2010 and were proud to spotlight her for her wonderful work on EveryDay LightWorker. Always a great time when Christopher & Jeri get together!!

Christopher Reburn | Jeri Hemerlein | Apothecary Jeri | Bees | Flower Essences

item.title: EveryDay LightWorker: Sherry Dmytrewycz - Feb 21,2012
item.description:
EveryDay LightWorker February 2012 LightWorker Spotlight SHERRY DMYTREWYCZ Sherry Dmytrewycz is a gifted and dedicated medical intuitive, as well as a conduit for a variety of energy healing modalities. She is a wife, mother of two sons and former elementary school teacher. She spent several years as a remedial reading and math teacher, working with students with learning difficulties, before deciding to explore, develop and use her healing gifts. She has traveled extensively and has lived in Pakistan, Tunisia, the former Soviet Union and Panama. Sherry believes that we can heal ourselves, but that we can also benefit from assistance in recognizing and releasing thought patterns or habits that are keeping us from moving forward in our lives. To foster self-healing, she shares suggestions with her clients to assist them in bringing their bodies back into balance. Sherry receives information from Spirit in a variety of ways. She is empathic (understands another’s situation, feelings, and motives), clairvoyant (sees objects or events not perceived by the senses), clairsentient (feels things not normally felt by most people) and clairaudient (hears Spiritual communication outside the range of normal perception). Her intuitive skills often give her a look at the inner organs of the body and the emotional base causing the body to be out of balance. Sherry has appeared numerous times on Conversations with Christopher, and we are glad to have her back once again!

Christopher Reburn | Sherry Dmytrewycz | Everyday Lightworker | Healing | Medical Intuitive

item.title: EveryDay LightWorker: Alli Battaglia - Jan 17,2012
item.description:
With an unmistakeable vocal tone and a songwriting palate of many colors, Alli Battaglia is the driving force behind The Musical Brewing Co. Inspired to follow her dreams after surviving a near fatal auto accident, she decided to begin writing and performing. She is currently pursuing a Masters Certificate at The Berklee School of Music. Inspirations include The Dave Matthews Band, Live, Paul Simon & Melissa Etheridge. Alli continues to satisfy her ever-growing legion of loyal fans & its her passionate flare that makes her live appearances a very intimate & intoxicating experience. The first time I heard her voice, it brought tears to my eyes. I instantly wanted to hear more & learn more about this facsinating singer. A surreal feeling of peace fell over me as I began to listen to her anthem song, Isaac. Its been a very long time since a vocalist has touched my heart in the fashion Alli has. She has no earthly idea how special she is, which makes her all the more to behold and appreciate. Im so proud of her, and its a gift to me to call her my friend. Check her out, get her music & youll thank me later!. Christopher Allis spiritual mission continues to unfold and gain strength and direction as she sets out to heal the world with her powerful & uplifting words and vocals. From the heart, and always keeping it real, Alli is a musical genius whose raw and heart-grabbing vocals will keep your ears listening and your heart understanding that tomorrows a new day and todays meant to be cherished. Join Christopher as he welcomes his dear friend to the show for the very 1st time! Visit Alli online at http://www.allibattaglia.com

Christopher Reburn | Alli Battaglia | The Musical Brew Co | Water Drop Flame | Isaac

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BACK LORNA BYRNE - Dec 01,2011
item.description:
MARK YOUR CALENDARS! SHEs BACK! A show you wont want to miss! Bestselling Author & Irish Mystic LORNA BYRNE Author of Angels In My Hair Lorna Byrne has been seeing and talking to angels since she was a baby. Now, having raised her family, she talks openly for the first time about what she has seen and learned. This decision led to her book Angels In My Hair, published in May 2008 which has become an international bestseller. She lives quietly in rural Ireland. For anyone who has ever wondered about the mysteries that lie beyond everyday experience, or doubted the reality of the afterlife, Angels in My Hair is a moving and deeply inspirational journey into the unseen world. For as long as she can remember, Lorna Byrne has seen angels. As a young child, she assumed everyone could see the otherworldly beings who always accompanied her. Yet in the eyes of adults, her abnormal behavior was a symptom of mental deficiency. Today, sick and troubled people from around the world are drawn to her for comfort and healing, and even theologians of different faiths seek her guidance. Lorna is trusted for her ability to communicate with spirits and angels—and by sharing her intimate knowledge of the spiritual world she offers a message of hope and love to us all. In this uplifting autobiography, a modern-day Irish mystic shares her vivid encounters and conversations with the angels and spirits she has known her entire life. Dont miss this very special and powerful return engagement celebrating the American paperback release of Angels In My Hair with two new exciting chapters!

Christopher Reburn | Lorna Byrne | Angels In My Hair | Angels | Talking with Angels

item.title: HEALING FEARS & INSECURITIES with CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Oct 27,2011
item.description:
Are fears and insecurities getting in the way of your spiritual journey and destiny? Listen as I share some ways on how to rid certain fears and insecurities once and for all and begin welcoming a happier, more spiritual lifestyle. item.description:
Some people have concerns with distancing their ego from their spiritual work, so I would like to do a show about this very topic and how the ego can reek havoc within ones spiritual journey and can also block ones spiritual and psychic gifts when universal warnings go unheeded. Do you have concerns with your ego influencing your spiritual journey or affecting your psychic gifts? Listen in as I share some ways to keep yourself well grounded, positive and in good connection with the universe as well as some other techniques to help keep ego out of your journey! item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BACK MEDIUM LISA WILLIAMS - Aug 11,2011
item.description:
World Renowned Medium & Clairvoyant, Bestselling Author & Star of Lifetime TVs Life Among The Dead and Life After Death on the Style Network Celebrated Medium & Clairvoyant Lisa Williams One of the worlds finest spiritual leaders and mediums is back with us once again for another hour of spiritual conversation! About to embark on another international world tour in September, and on the heels of her latest bestseller, Survival of the Soul, Lisa will have lots to share with us about her own spiritual journey as well as some upcoming Lisa events that youll want to be a part of and so much more! In her sixth appearance on the Conversations with Christopher, Lisa will share with us some of her most passionate spiritual philosophies and more! When Lisa Williams was a little girl, she discovered she had a gift. Communicating with those who are no longer with us. Some people say what she does is scary other people say she change their lives. Lisa just says what she hears and sees and she sees a lot. Lisas personal spiritual journey has been an exciting and rewarding one. She had to go through many life-changing experiences to understand what her calling was in life. Lisa Williams is now able to share her gifts with you through large audience readings while on her lecture tour. Always a great time with Lisa and Christopher get together! Dont miss this exciting conversation as Christopher welcomes back the incomparable Lisa Williams! PLEASE NOTE: Lisa Williams will not be giving readings, but will be sharing with us some of her candid wit, knowledge and philosophies! Visit Lisa online at www.lisawilliams.com

item.title: NAYSAYER FRIENDS & FAMILY: FINDING YOUR SUPPORT SYSTEM - Jun 17,2011
item.description:
A spiritual journey is challenging enough without having to contend with unsupportive friends and family members who may not get or understand your spiritual mission and life purpose. For years, during both readings and courses, clients have shared with me their own personal heartache over the lack of support from those they love the most when it comes to doing readings, offering healings and being spiritual in general. Listen in as I share some ways on how to deal with unsupportive family and friends, ways to approach your beliefs with skeptics as well some ways you can find support from within and how to establish and keep a healthy support system, and much more!

item.title: A CONVERSATION ON ATLANTIS & LEMURIA with NENARI - Jun 01,2011
item.description:
Join world renowned spiritual teacher and psychic Christopher Reburn as he welcomes back his dear friend Dr. Patti Diamond (known to many by her Lemurian name, Nenari) for an informative discussion on Atlantis and Lemuria. Spiritualists from around the world are facsinated by both of these places and topics, and Nenari has lots of information to share with us about these mystical places. Will we see Atlantis again? Where is Lemuria? What do these places hold for our future? Get your answers here! Known as the Princess of the Sea, the “Diamondlady” of Lemuria who brings the Love and Light to the world in all ways through the gifts poured through her hands and through the beauty of her song, Nenari, Princess of the Sea, is a universally celebrated singer, author, speaker, and spiritual mentor within the resonance of Spiritual Oneness. As an Ambassadour of Love and Light, Nenari is known as the “Diamondlady” of Lemuria, the soul who brings forth the Diamond energy of Lemuria to this earth within infinite ways. She is currently the author of several books including "Life Long Learning ~ Transforming Learning" and "Stepping Into Spiritual Oneness ~ Spiritual Rememberings of the Soul Through Life Experience", and “Song of the Princess”; and has appeared on various radio shows and within articles of international publications. Currently, Nenari has a regular featured column in the India Newspost entitled The OM (the One Moment). Nenari is also the Director of The Diamondlight Spiritual Oneness Centre and also the co~creator of the OneSoul REALationship Series along with her spiritual partner Natu. Nenari is a gifted channeler and healer. As a spiritually gifted reader, she has over 25 years experience in channeling Spirit. She is also a Crystal Therapist, Reiki Master, Chakra Therapist, and a meditational guru. A show you wont want to miss!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES SPIRITUAL TEACHER & AUTHOR OF 'SPIRITUAL WISDOM' CLAIRE MONTANARO - May 21,2011
item.description:
Claire Montanaro is a spiritual teacher, writer, speaker and guide currently living in England. She teaches an ancient but largely forgotten philosophy for living and being to individuals and communities throughout the world to encourage personal transformation, growth, and global harmony. For many years, Claire was seen as a successful businesswoman working internationally in the world of the military, finance and politics. Her life and path changed in 1996 following a profound spiritual wake-up call which caused her to leave the corporate world and begin her service to spirit. Claire has written and gifted the world with "Spiritual Wisdom", in which she explains the ancient spiritual truths and how they apply to you and to our world. She teaches you how to achieve peace of mind and heart through spiritual understanding; the meaning and relevance of the Spiritual Laws; karma, reincarnation, your souls journey and life and death; how to contact and work with spiritual guides and discover your place in the divine cosmos; and how to maximise your potential as a spiritual being, and so much more! Dont miss this very special show as Christopher welcomes the Claire to the show for the very first time for an exciting chat about her life mission, her journey, ancient philosophies and her amazing book! Visit Claire online at http://www.inluminoglobal.co.uk/ and be sure to let her know you heard her on Conversations with Christopher!.

item.title: Brain Balancing with Christopher Reburn & Sherry Dmytrewcyz - May 18,2011
item.description:
Join world renowned spiritual teacher & psychic Christopher Reburn along with his good friend healer, lightworker extraordinare and founder of Healing Gateway Sherry Dmytrewcyz for an informative chat about brain balancing! Brain balancing has become a much more popular topic over the last few years with numerous documented success rates as well as positive benefits to those who partake in the many blessings the art of brain balancing gives forth. Brain balancing can allow various improvements and enhancements to ones focus, balance and concentration levels, as well as numerous other life changing benefits such as reducing everyday challenges, improving self confidence and self esteem, reducing tension and stress levels giving yourself a fair shot at learning, growing and developing more! The list of benefits goes on and on, and Christopher & Sherry have lots to share with you on this very facsinating topic you wont want to miss! Join Christopher as he welcomes Sherry (his dear friend & a resident guest of the show!) back to the show for a great chat about this very important topic and technique which can help your life as well!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BACK MEDIUM & INTUITIVE GUIDE COLETTE BARON-REID - Feb 16,2011
item.description:
The Amazing & Incomparable COLETTE BARON-REID Celebrated Spiritual Intuitive, Psychic Medium & Bestselling Author! Colette Baron-Reid is an internationally renowned intuitive counselor, educator and best-selling Hay House author who helps others recognize and connect with their own intuition, potential and purpose. Powerful motivational speaker, charismatic broadcast personality, and acclaimed performer, storyteller and recording artist, Colette uses her extraordinary spiritual gifts to empower her clients to live a life that is “awake and authentic”, and to create a reality that is spiritual, deliberate and meaningful. Passionate about people, Colette’s work as an intuitive and medium is to help individuals see the magic and meaning in the Story of their lives. She has brought her message of hope, healing and humor to audiences of thousands in 150 cities across North America, Europe and the UK. Her popular books and audio programs are found worldwide. Remembering The Future, Messages From Spirit, The Wisdom of Avalon, and Wisdom of the Hidden Realms have been translated into Japanese, Russian, French, Slovenian, Polish, Czech and German. Her newest book, The Map: Finding The Magic & Meaning In The Story Of Your Life, has just been released. Colette's last appearance on the show in April 2010 was one of the most powerful shows of the year. This promises to be a great show that you won't want to miss when Christopher welcomes Colette back to the show for the second time for a chat about her latest bestseller 'The Map', her spiritual philosophies and the wit and humor you've come to expect from Colette.

item.title: A SOULMATES VALENTINES DAY SHOW with Psychic CHRISTOPHER REBURN & Bestselling Author NANCY HOWRY - Feb 15,2011
item.description:
CHRISTOPHER & NANCY: TOGETHER AGAIN! Spend a Valentines Day evening with Psychic & Spiritual Teacher Christopher Reburn joined by bestselling author Nancy Howry ('The Souls of My Feet') for a discussion on Soulmates & Life Partners, and the spiritual connection that is established between soulmates before they ever meet in person! In August 2008, Ms. Howry released 'The Souls of My Feet' to rave reviews and the book has since become an international success and has garned her respect from readers worldwide. Howry has been a frequent guest on 'Conversations with Christopher' over the years and is currently working on introducing three new books to her readers. It's been nearly two years since these two friends shared some 'on-air' time together, so you won't want to miss this show on a topic close to all of our hearts on a day when romance is in full bloom! Find Nancy on the web at http://www.twitter.com/nancyhowry and order her book 'The Souls of My Feet' at http://www.authorhouse.com/Bookstore/BookDetail.aspx?BookId=SKU-000250379

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BACK CELEBRATED MEDIUM & CLAIRVOYANT LISA WILLIAMS - Feb 02,2011
item.description:
World Renowned Medium & Clairvoyant, Bestselling Author & Star of Lifetime TV's 'Life Among The Dead' and 'Life After Death' on the Style Network Celebrated Medium & Clairvoyant Lisa Williams One of the worlds finest spiritual leaders and mediums is back with us once again for another hour of spiritual conversation! About to embark on another world tour, with an upcoming Audio CD as well as the release of her latest book 'Survival of the Soul', Lisa will have lots to share with us about her upcoming journey to Australia & New Zealand, her new book & CD, some upcoming Lisa events that you'll want to be a part of and so much more! In her fifth appearance on the show, Lisa will share with us how important it is to be spiritually positive on your spiritual journey and much more! When Lisa Williams was a little girl, she discovered she had a gift. Communicating with those who are no longer with us. Some people say what she does is scary other people say she change their lives. Lisa just says what she hears and sees and she sees a lot. Lisa's personal 'spiritual' journey has been an exciting and rewarding one. She had to go through many life-changing experiences to understand what her calling was in life. Lisa Williams is now able to share her gifts with you through large audience readings and her TV show, Life After Death, which debuted October 14, 2010 on the Style Network. Always a great time with Lisa and Christopher get together! Don't miss this exciting conversation as Christopher welcomes back the incomparable Lisa Williams! PLEASE NOTE: Lisa Williams will not be giving readings, but will be sharing with us some of her candid wit, knowledge and philosophies! Visit Lisa online at www.lisawilliams.com

item.title: MEETING YOUR SPIRIT GUIDE with SPIRITUAL TEACHER & PSYCHIC CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jan 29,2011
item.description:
Our Guides are there for us every second of every day. They never leave our sides and are always there to ensure our continued safety and protection, and also to make sure we are keeping on charted path and life mission. During this show, listen as I share some ways on how you can communicate and meet your own Spirit Guide, why some of us have more than one Guide, how to receive messages from your Guide, what a Guide really does and so much more! Spirit Guides is always a popular topic and I'm looking forward to answering your questions about your Guides!

item.title: FOCUSING ON INNER STRENGTHS & COURAGE with PSYCHIC & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jan 29,2011
item.description:
Sometimes in life we must rely on the inner strengths and courage that God and the Angels give us so freely to use. During this show, we'll talk about ways on how you can find your own inner strengths and their definitions, how to manifest more strength and how your Guides help you with infinite anmounts of courage when situations call for it. I'm looking forward to sharing with you a meditation prayer of strength and courage that my Guides shared with me years ago and some ways on how you can strengthen your spirituality!

item.title: AN AFTERNOON OF HOLIDAY MEMORIES & BLESSINGS with CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Dec 04,2010
item.description:
Don't miss my annual festive holiday celebration as we take a stroll down memory lane and remember some of our favorite holiday memories and reasons why we are thankful and why we are so blessed. I look forward in taking your calls to hear about your past holiday memories and inspiration holiday stories, why you are blessed and what you are most thankful for this year! Don't miss my last show of 2010. What better way to end another 'on air' year than to celebrate the blessings we have been bestowed! What's a party without gifts? Everyone who listens to this show will receive a special gift from me to use in 2011. There will be other giveaways during this show and one lucky listener will receive a free reading with me in 2011! There will also be some surprises on this show so exciting we can't speak of them -- you'll have to listen to hear all the dish! Thank you for another amazing year of great shows! I couldnt have done it without you! Blessed holidays to you and your family! Love & Light from Christopher

item.title: FROM VICTIM TO VICTOR: HEALING IN THE AFTERMATH OF BULLYING with CHRISTOPHER REBURN & SPECIAL GUESTS - Nov 29,2010
item.description:
Have you ever been bullied so bad where you've contemplated suicide? Has bullying affected your life? Don't miss one of the most powerful shows of the year when Christopher Reburn (along with bestselling author Trish Bishop) tackles a very sensitive topic: bullying, healing in the aftermath of bullying, ways to cope, how to rid the energy & memories from your Spirit and regaining full control of your life again! We want to hear from you! The phone lines will be open the entire hour for you to call in and share your story! Remember, talking about it is one of the first steps to inviting in the healing process, and will also help thousands of people around the world to hear your story, how you dealt with being bullied, how you are dealing with it now and ways you found helpful to live a positive lifestyle. This promises to be one of the most heartfelt and powerful live shows of 2010!

item.title: A FURRY ANGEL HOLIDAY SHOW with CHRISTOPHER REBURN & SPECIAL GUEST BETHANNE ELION - Nov 20,2010
item.description:
Ever wonder what it's like on The Other Side for pets during the holidays? How often do our pets on The Other Side visit us? Want to learn how to better care for your pets during the cold winter months? Gift giving ideas for pets? Ready to attend your first holiday show of the season? Join Christopher as he welcomes his good friend animal intuitive, bestselling author and resident Animal Communicator Bethanne Elion back to 'Conversations' for a yuletide delight surrounding the pets we love! Bethanne has been deeply involved in animal communication and holistic healing for many years. She works as a nutrition consultant for private clients and for Volhard Nutrition, makers of natural diet and other whole health balancing products for dogs. As a psychic medium, she incorporates her knowledge of the influences of health and nutrition on behavior in her intuitive pet consultations. Her clients include organic dairy farms, ill and recovering dogs, pets with behavior issues and their owners. Bethanne wrote the bestselling 'Memoirs of the Bathtub Psychic: The True Story of a Clairvoyant & Her Dogs' and is currently at work on the sequel. It's always a great time when Bethanne comes on the show. Expect lots of great conversation on topics important to you and your pets with a festive touch! Expect a few laughs, too! Don't miss this very special holiday edition of 'Conversations with Christopher'.

item.itunes:summary: Ever wonder what it's like on The Other Side for pets during the holidays? How often do our pets on The Other Side visit us? Want to learn how to better care for your pets during the cold winter months? Gift giving ideas for pets? Ready to attend your first holiday show of the season? Join Christopher as he welcomes his good friend animal intuitive, bestselling author and resident Animal Communicator Bethanne Elion back to 'Conversations' for a yuletide delight surrounding the pets we love! Bethanne has been deeply involved in animal communication and holistic healing for many years. She works as a nutrition consultant for private clients and for Volhard Nutrition, makers of natural diet and other whole health balancing products for dogs. As a psychic medium, she incorporates her knowledge of the influences of health and nutrition on behavior in her intuitive pet consultations. Her clients include organic dairy farms, ill and recovering dogs, pets with behavior issues and their owners. Bethanne wrote the bestselling 'Memoirs of the Bathtub Psychic: The True Story of a Clairvoyant & Her Dogs' and is currently at work on the sequel. It's always a great time when Bethanne comes on the show. Expect lots of great conversation on topics important to you and your pets with a festive touch! Expect a few laughs, too! Don't miss this very special holiday edition of 'Conversations with Christopher'.

item.title: EMBRACING YOUR TRUE DESTINY with PSYCHIC & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Nov 06,2010
item.description:
We all come to this earth plane with many things we need to accomplish before we cross over, including some goals and lessons we need to experience and learn from along the way. We also come here with a gift and a passion. Most times our gift and our passion can be two entirely different things. Do you know what your gift is? Do you know what your passion is? Are you longing to embrace the true you? Listen as I share some experiences and exercises on shifting your conciousness and embracing your true destiny, and what lies ahead for those who truly embracing who they are on the inside and out! Become a fan of the show on Facebook, go to http://www.facebook.com/conversationswithchristopher for show updates, special rewards and more!

item.title: FOCUSING ON YOUR SPIRITUAL JOURNEY with PSYCHIC & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Nov 06,2010
item.description:
As we are getting closer to the end of another year, I'd like to talk about your spiritual journey and how you can better focus on it Join me for a chat about your gifts, spiritual purpose and life mission, how to handle and deal with unsupportive family & friends, why everyone has a life meaning and reason for being here, where your current journey is leading you and what to look forward to as we continue moving closer to 2012, our spiritual year of rejuvenation. Have questions about your psychic and spiritual gifts? Need some further guidance on how to pursue them and help others? Would you like some 'support system' recommendations on how you can interact with other like-minded friends? I'm really looking forward to this show and answering your questions on this very important and relevant topic! Visit my website at http://www.reburn.org

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BACK LISA WILLIAMS - Oct 08,2010
item.description:
World Renowned Medium & Clairvoyant, Bestselling Author & Star of the new TV Show 'Life After Death' on the Style Network Celebrated Medium & Clairvoyant Lisa Williams One of the worlds finest spiritual leaders and mediums is back with us once again for another hour of spiritual conversation! Lisa joins Christopher to share some of her recent adventures following her international tour, the upcoming debut of her new show 'Life After Death' on the Style Network, what's in store for 2011 and much more! In her fourth appearance on the show, Lisa will share with us some ways on how she keeps herself spiritually grounded and centered, and ways to deal with a hectic life, yet still have time for one's spiritual journey. If Lisa can do it, so can you! When Lisa Williams was a little girl, she discovered she had a gift. Communicating with those who are no longer with us. Some people say what she does is scary other people say she change their lives. Lisa just says what she hears and sees and she sees a lot. Lisa's personal 'spiritual' journey has been an exciting and rewarding one. She had to go through many life-changing experiences to understand what her calling was in life. Lisa Williams is now able to share her gifts with you through large audience readings and her new TV show, Life After Death, debuting October 14 on the Style Network. Always a great time with Lisa and Christopher get together! Don't miss this exciting conversation as Christopher welcomes back the incomparable Lisa Williams! PLEASE NOTE: Lisa Williams will not be giving readings, but will be sharing with us some of her candid wit, knowledge and philosophies! Visit Lisa online at www.lisawilliams.com

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES 'A TALE OF TWO BROTHERS' AUTHOR JACQUELINE MURRAY - Sep 30,2010
item.description:
Psychic Medium & Bestselling Author JACQUELINE MURRAY Rock legends Jim Morrison of "The Doors" and Michael Hutchence of "INXS" visit their chosen channel once again to offer more insights about life on this side and the great beyond. In the blockbuster book 'A Tale of Two Brothers' Psychic Medium Jacqueline Murray brings to life the channeled accounts of the lives and deaths of Jim Morrison and Michael Hutchence. These rock legends wish to give their words to Jacqueline, based on her clarity, and pure intent to give their true stories, without adding her own bias or opinions. This book will take you on a journey that will make you believe Jim Morrison and Michael Hutchence are standing next to you having a conversation. The author is an exceptionally gifted psychic who does not offer readings or advertise her gifts. Ms. Murray recognizes Christopher Reburn as one of her spiritual teachers. Jacqueline is also one of Christopher's dear friends which will make this show a very powerful one! Don't miss an amazing show about the power of mediumship and channeling messages from beyond!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES ANIMAL INTUITIVE & INTUIVE COACH DANIELLE MACKINNON - Sep 17,2010
item.description:
Animal Intuitive & Intuitive Coach DANIELLE MACKINNON Danielle MacKinnon is a renowned animal intuitive and intuitive coach whose vision is to empower others to live fulfilling and enjoyable lives. Deeply connected to the animal kingdom, Danielle communicates with pets and humans effortlessly. She uses her psychic abilities to help animals and their people better understand one another while working toward a common goal: happiness. Her particular gift is in revealing the soul contract between pet and human. Armed with her belief that grounding and clarity lead the way to peace, Danielle’s work as an intuitive coach allows her facilitate and inspire evolution within each of her clients. Her method combines guidance from her own guide team, her client’s guide team, and her own personal experience with many other tools, as she is guided to include them. Danielle has been featured in newspapers, magazines, webzines, radio shows, TV shows and more. She was most recently highlighted in Psychic Medium John Holland’s new book “Spirit Whisperer.” Holland appeared on 'Conversations with Christopher' in April 2010. Don't miss this very special show as Christopher welcomes Danielle MacKinnon on the show for the very first time!

item.title: 9/11: 9 YEARS LATER! AN AFTERNOON OF REMEMBRANCE, LOVE & HEALING with CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Sep 11,2010
item.description:
Join us as we remember those we lost nine years ago during our nation's worst tragedy. Let us all come together to partake in an afternoon of remembrance and healing as we pay tribute to all of those who lost their lives in 9/11, and all of the fallen heroes, friends, family and pets we've lost that meant so much to us along life's journey. Join me for a celebration of life and love, and to give blessings to all of those whom we hold dear to our heart. Your calls, stories of strength and courage, prayers and healing requests will be taken during this show!

item.title: CROSSING OVER: LIFE ON THE OTHER SIDE with PSYCHIC & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Sep 04,2010
item.description:
When we cross over from this earthly plane to The Other Side (Heaven), we immediately get to make sense of our life and all answers that one may spend much of their earthbound life seeking are finally answered. We then continue our work for God. In fact, most of us who are lightworkers continue to do our work on The Other Side, only the energy is much stronger and everyone is always 100% accurate and the strength of healing is much more significant. Through over twenty-three years of doing readings and connecting to The Other Side, I'd love to share with you what it's really like for us when we cross over, for that's when our real work begins and ignites. Do Spirits on The Other Side sleep? Do people argue on The Other Side? Can I reunite with my loved one once I cross over? Are all secrets finally revealed? Are there unlimited cheesecakes on The Other Side? These are all questions I've been asked and answered over the years, and I'm looking forward to sharing those answers with you, and many more! This show will be really special and healing to those who may have recently lost a loved one or someone close to them and are seeking answers to what Spirit life on The Other Side is like!

item.title: THE PARANORMAL HOUR with CHRISTOPHER REBURN & JENNY STEWART - Sep 04,2010
item.description:
Join World Renowned Psychic Medium & Spiritual Teacher Christopher, along with his dear friend and Founder of the Paranormal Research & Resource Society, Jenny Stewart, as they embark on a brand new monthly show on 'Conversations with Christopher' called 'The Paranormal Hour with Christopher & Jenny' where they will answer all of your questions on the paranormal along with a new topic to be determined for each show. item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES 'GHOSTS OF CENTRAL ARIZONA' AUTHOR HEATHER WOODWARD - Aug 21,2010
item.description:
Author, Paranormal Investigator & Teacher HEATHER WOODWARD Author of the 'Ghosts of Central Arizona' Heather Woodward is an author, a clairvoyant, an “accidental” medium, and a psychometrist. Since 1996, she has performed tarot readings, paranormal investigations and psychic profiling - helping others with her born-given gifts for over 12 years. Heather is the author of Ghosts of Central Arizona, a book about her personal experiences in the some of the most haunted and supernatural locations in Sedona, Jerome, Cottonwood and surrounding areas. Heather produced, edited and directed the paranormal documentary, Dead House, which regularly hits the top 20 best selling DVD rank on Amazon in the Supernatural category. Dead House is about a haunted house with a chilling history of witchcraft located La Conchita, California. The film was featured at the 2008 Dead of Winter Festival, hosted by Troy Taylor. She teaches a practical psychic development class at Pima Community College in Tucson, Arizona and writes an online metaphysical and paranormal column for the Tucson Examiner. Don't miss this very exciting show as Christopher welcomes Heather Woodward to the show for a chat on her book 'Ghosts of Central Arizona', her life mission and so much more!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BACK HEALERS & LIGHTWORKERS SHERRY DMYTREWYCZ & APOTHECARY JERI - Aug 18,2010
item.description:
Don't miss this very special evening as Christopher welcomes back two of his longtime and dearest friends and two of the finest healers and lightworkers in the world! Sherry Dmytrewycz is a gifted and dedicated medical intuitive, as well as a conduit for a variety of energy healing modalities. She is a wife, mother of two sons and former elementary school teacher. She spent several years as a remedial reading and math teacher, working with students with learning difficulties, before deciding to explore, develop and use her healing gifts. Sherry is the founder of Healing Gateway and continues to spread healing and love to all she meets. Jeri Hemerlein, known to her legion of followers as 'Apothecary Jeri', lives by a simple philosophy 'Enhance and expand your energy bodies' and it's been her life mission to help others heal with her proven techniques and alternative healing remedies for years. Jeri comes from a long line of healers in her family and is now living out alot of her grandmother's own spiritual desires in helping to heal others. She is the Founder, Director and home to Heirloom Remedy Nature Essences and works in dedicated service to Spirit and Nature. This show has been a long time in the making, and we are thrilled to bring you a powerful show of this magnitude!

item.description:
There are so many wonderful lightworkers and healers all over the world who have been doing this great work for much of their lives. There are also alot of people who are trying to focus on their healing abilities and are unsure in which direction to go, or how to start. Listen as I share some ways on how you can unlock your healing abilities and spiritual gifts, as well ways on how you can strengthen your healing ability and much more! Join me for a wonderful conversation all about healing!

item.description:
Join World Renowned Psychic Medium & Spiritual Teacher Christopher, along with his dear friend and Founder of the Paranormal Research & Resource Society, Jenny Stewart, as they embark on a brand new monthly show on 'Conversations with Christopher' called 'The Paranormal Hour with Christopher & Jenny' where they will answer all of your questions on the paranormal along with a new topic to be determined for each show. Due to some Internet connectivity issues today, brought on by some storms last night associated with Tropical Storm Bonnie, we've had to postpone our Saturday show as our Internet keeps going on and off. Today's scheduled topic has already been rescheduled for August.

Have a good rest of your weekend,
 
 
Christopher

item.title: ATTRACTING THE RIGHT PEOPLE IN YOUR LIFE with PSYCHIC & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jul 17,2010
item.description:
During each lifetime on this earth plane, we meet and run into alot very different people. Some of the people that we meet during our lives can become our friends, our romantic partners and spouses. Alot of the people we meet on our journey will be apart of our lives forever with feelings of peace and happiness. And then there are other people we meet along life's journey that can throw our world to pieces based on bad decisions, game playing and trickery. Listen as I share ways on how you can trust your intution by going with your first impressions of a person as well as opening yourself up to meeting and greeting healthier people in your life for solid friendships and/or romantic partnerships and relationships, and why one's inner confidence in themselves is so important! We'll talk about this and much more during this life-changing segment!

Christopher Reburn | Attracting The Right People | Intensions Of Those Around You | Healthy Relationships | Healthy Friendships

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BACK CELEBRATED MEDIUM & CLAIRVOYANT LISA WILLIAMS - Jul 16,2010
item.description:
World Renowned Medium & Clairvoyant, Bestselling Author & Star of Lifetime TV's 'Lisa Williams: Life Among the Dead' Celebrated Medium & Clairvoyant Lisa Williams One of the worlds finest spiritual leaders and mediums is back with us once again for another hour of spiritual conversation! Join Christopher as he welcomes back Lisa Williams to the show for a discussion on her upcoming international tour, a chat on spirituality, upcoming events and all things Lisa! About to embark on another amazing UK & European tour and with a few new projects in the works, Lisa will have lots to share with us about her life and her continued spiritual journey. We'll also talk with her on how and why she remains ever strong in her lifelong effort and pursuit in helping others communicate with loved ones on The Other Side. When Lisa Williams was a little girl, she discovered she had a gift. Communicating with those who are no longer with us. Some people say what she does is scary other people say she change their lives. Lisa just says what she hears and sees and she sees a lot. Lisa's personal 'spiritual' journey has been an exciting and rewarding one. She had to go through many life-changing experiences to understand what her calling was in life. Lisa Williams is now able to share her gifts with you through large audience readings on her various lecture tours and her new TV show, Lisa Williams: Voices from the Other Side and also Lisa Williams: Life Among the Dead. Don't miss this exciting conversation as Christopher welcomes back one of the most sought after and leading mediums in the world! PLEASE NOTE: Lisa Williams will not be giving readings, but will be sharing with us some of her candid wit, knowledge and philosophies! Visit Lisa online at www.lisawilliams.com

item.title: HOLDING ON & HOLDING BACK: LETTING GO OF THINGS THAT DONT WORK FOR YOU with CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jul 10,2010
item.description:
Do you ever find yourself wanting to advance in your spiritual journey but you are scared and you find yourself holding back? Is there a difficult situation in your life that you are holding on to when all hope seems to be exhausted? Join me as I talk about why we hold on to things that we are never meant to achieve, and why letting go of things that dont work for us will ultimately set us free and will enable you to become much more centered and grounded to your life plan and purpose!

item.title: RELEASING INSECURITIES FROM YOUR SPIRITUAL JOURNEY with CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jul 10,2010
item.description:
With so many things going on in the world effecting our energy levels, it's not hard to pick up insecurities and anxieties which can delay and sometimes block one's spiritual journey and the further development of their intuitive and spiritual gifts. Listen as I share some ways on how you can release insecurities and anxieties which may be blocking you from living a happy, positive spiritual life. I'll also share some ways on how you can find more a solid support system within your own family and circle of friends. It's time to release those insecurities and anxieties and spring forth with who you were put here to be!

item.description:

We all have the power to make our dreams a reality if those dreams and desires are meant to happen to us in this lifetime! Through some simple techniques, let me share with you some ways on how you can start manifesting more positive experiences and outcomes in your life! Thank you for listening to the show! item.title: RECEIVING ADVANCE WARNING SIGNS FROM YOUR GUIDES & ANGELS with SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jul 03,2010
item.description:
Our loving Spirit Guides & beautiful Angels are constantly sending us messages. While some of these messages are general or random signsls and signs, whereas others can be live saving in some circumstances -- including advance warning signs of pending danger, tragedy, illness, loss of a loved one and many others. Listen as I share some ways and exercises on how you can make sure your channel is always clear and open to receive messages from your Spirit Guides & Angels, especially when you need to hear them the most. Thanks for listening to the show, and be sure to check out my website at http://www.reburn.org

Listen as I share some ways and exercises on how you can make sure your channel is always clear and open to receive messages from your Spirit Guides & Angels, especially when you need to hear them the most. Thanks for listening to the show, and be sure to check out my website at http://www.reburn.org

item.title: THE IMPORTANCE OF PATIENCE & SPIRITUAL ACCEPTANCE with SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - May 29,2010
item.description:
Beginning your spiritual journey is an amazing experience, and it can be very challenging at times when you are wanting to attune your spiritual and psychic gifts, skills and abilities to the highest level you can to provide the great result. Learning and attuning can be a slow process from some, and a faster process for others. Patience is virtue, as everyone is different and manifests their abilities at different times of their journey. Patience is very important to the continued positive impact of your spiritual travels. Accepting yourself as a divine conduit and spiritual healer and messenger from God is very overwhelming at times, even when you are constantly shown signs that you are doing as you were put here to do. Some of this has to deal with one not fully accepting themselves for who they are within their spiritual soul and spirit. Listen as I share some ways on you can obtain more patience via one of my meditation techniques, and why you already accept yourself but sometimes find yourself judging yourself and how that is blocking that acceptance, and how to remove those blocks! Thanks for listening to the show, and be sure to become my friend on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/christopher.reburn I love new friends!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES 'DREAMING THE PYRAMID' AUTHOR STEPHANE WUTTUNEE TO THE SHOW! - May 29,2010
item.description:
STEPHANE WUTTUNEE Author of Dreaming The Pyramid Along with God and our cosmic offworld brethren, we (as spirits who had not yet taken physical form) co-created the Earth and left proof of our divine nature within the design of Egypt's Great Pyramid. This is the premise behind Stephane Wuttunee's DREAMING THE PYRAMID. Wuttunee reveals how the Pyramid was designed to portray human beings as they originally once were: androgenous, immortal, and omniscient. Stephane believes that the premise is simple. The Great Pyramid of Egypt, the last remaining wonder of the ancient world was designed and built to represent the greatest wonder of all - us! Is it possible that the giant structure has only just begun revealing its true nature & secrets? Could Extraterrestrials or a much more highly advanced civilization have helped design and build it? Wuttunee believes so and will share with us his visions and beliefs on this mystical topic! The author’s awakening started in 1991 at age 22. He began dreaming of humanity’s past, various mathematical symbols, and pyramid shapes similar to the ones found in Egypt. These progressed to feeling physical touches on his skin and hearing voices. Fearing he was becoming delusional, he left on a journey that involved 4,500 miles of wilderness canoeing, as well as living out of a backpack for ten years. Insights imparted by his travels and research as well as time spent with Indigenous elders from around the world. Stephane's mission is to help us remember that we are not victims trapped in a cold, uncaring Universe. Rather, we are powerful spiritual beings who long ago decided to build, along with God, a virtual environment through which our creative abilities could be explored. Join Christopher as he welcomes Stephane to the show for the first time!

Christopher Reburn | Stephane Wuttunee | The Great Pyramid | Dreaming The Pyramid | Egypt

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BESTSELLING IRISH AUTHOR OF 'THE UNCOMMON PATH' MICK QUINN TO THE SHOW! - May 15,2010
item.description:
Bestselling Irish Author MICK QUINN Author of The Uncommon Path: Awakening Authentic Joy Mick Quinn's work is touching the hearts, minds, and spirits of all those who come in contact with his direct, yet gentle message. The Uncommon Path, is the second book by this Irish-born author. An essential aspect of this book points to identifying and letting go of concealed conditioning as a path of awakening to our full potential for the sake of humanity. Mick chose to give up his 'American Dream' lifestyle in 2001, to devote himself to a full-time process of spiritual development and the evolution of consciousness. Mick's life was radically transformed in the summer of 2001 while sitting in meditation with spiritual teacher. As a result of this inner transformation, Mick left his former life behind and began to write and teach about the seed of great potential which rests with each one of us. Mick believes that while a life story can be interesting, it is neither the wealth of our pasts, nor the depth of our experiences that determine who we have become. Who we are is rightly revealed by our actions. Mick created Choice for Enlightened Living Fellowship (CELF), which has exposed thousands of people worldwide to previously unknown possibilities of their own full potential. This Irish-born author's work is regularly quoted and featured in many publications, including The Washington Times, Crain's NYC Business, and The Wall Street Journal. Be sure to listen into this engaging conversation as Christopher welcomes bestselling author Mick Quinn to the show for the first time!

Christopher Reburn | Mick Quinn | The Uncommon Path | Awakening Authentic Joy | Spiritual Awakening

item.title: ACKNOWLEDGING, LOVING & APPRECIATING YOURSELF MORE with SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - May 15,2010
item.description:
You've heard me use the following phrase on my show a few times: 'life gets in the way'. When big things happen to us that threaten our journey (whether is be loss of a loved one, ending of a relationship, loss of home, job, pet, etc) one might find themselves immediately putting their spiritual gifts and spiritual journey on the backburner -- missing out on valuable learning and growth that's needed for your spiritual abilities and life mission. This is also a time when we tend to forget about ourselves altogether, and we forget to care for ourselves and give ourselves the love and appreciation that we need as spiritual beings of light to help guide our path onward. Listen as I share some messages that my Guides have given me over the years on ways of dealing with life when 'life gets in the way', and how to acknowledge your strengths and weaknesses, love yourself for who you are without any judgement and how you can appreciate yourself by just being yourself!

Christopher Reburn | Loving Yourself More | Acknowledging Your Importance | Understanding Yourself | Focusing On You

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN PROUDLY WELCOMES BACK AUTHOR & ANIMAL COMMUNICATOR BETHANNE ELION TO THE SHOW! - May 08,2010
item.description:
CALLING ALL ANIMAL LOVERS! Author & Animal Communicator BETHANNE ELION Author of 'Memoirs of The Bathtub Psychic: A True Story of a Clairvoyant & Her Dogs' Bethanne Elion is a gifted clairvoyant and animal communicator and has released her latest book 'Memoirs of the Bathtub Psychic: The True Story of a Clairvoyant and Her Dogs'. This book is the heartwarming true story of her relationship with her Newfoundland dogs, Sophie, Emma and Cubby. These “barking bears” teach her to trust her natural psychic ability, which leads to the discovery of her animal communication and healing gifts and skills. Afraid to acknowledge her instincts due to negative experiences as a child, a deep love for her dogs motivates Bethanne to open her mind and take unusual steps to improve their lives when they fall ill. She begins to suspect that some conventional veterinary practices, especially vaccinations, may have actually caused her pets’ serious health problems. Following her intuition and signals provided by her dogs and the Universe, she starts down the path toward holistic medicine. By opening the channel to psychic communication, Bethanne receives information about her previous incarnations and the lessons she must learn in her current lifetime. She does psychic readings for farmers and pet owners while relaxing in the bathtub, when her third eye is open and important clues for her clients’ healing are revealed. This marks Bethanne's third appearance on 'Conversations with Christopher' and she has become a featured guest of the show and makes quarterly appearances. It's always a wonderful time when Christopher & Bethanne get together! Be sure to listen in to learn more about animal communication and how to receive messages and warnings from your pets which could save your life!

item.title: CREATING SPIRITUAL ONENESS FOR YOU with PSYCHIC & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - May 08,2010
item.description:
Do you dream of living a happier spiritual lifestyle without so many hang up's, drama, stress and other things that seem to weigh you down just when you think you are getting ahead? When we reach a state of spiritual oneness with ourselves, it's a very peaceful and magical place where any doubt or insecurities about one's inner self, life purpose or gifts is released and allows for a clearer channel and one's life mission to be made brightly and clearly aware to them! Listen as I share some ways on how you can create and manifest spiritual oneness in your life, and some exercises on easily and quickly dismissing 'the small stuff' from the past and focusing more the present and future in a state of delight and happiness!

Christopher Reburn | Spiritual Oneness | Creating Your Spiritual Zone | Spiritual Journey | Spiritual Success

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES CELEBRATED AUTHOR & PSYCHIC MEDIUM JOHN HOLLAND - May 01,2010
item.description:
Celebrated Psychic Medium & Spiritual Teacher JOHN HOLLAND Author of the new 'The Spirit Whisperer: Chronicles of a Medium' John Holland is an internationally renowned psychic medium and spiritual teacher. He has been lecturing, teaching, demonstrating, and reading for private clients for over 17 years. He’s dedicated to the ongoing development of his unique gift and brings real integrity to his profession. Holland, one of the most sought after mediums in the country, states: "Mediumship is more than just delivering messages" he says, "it's about the confirmation and validation that once our physical body dies, our 'spirit' lives on, but more importantly how the spirits of our relatives, friends, and loved ones are still connected to us." He is the author of the best sellers: Power of the Soul, Psychic Navigator, Born Knowing, and his latest The Spiritual Whisperer: Chronicles of a Medium. Listen as Christopher welcomes John to the show for the very first time, for an engaging discussion on his new book, his thoughts on spirituality, his own first-hand experiences that led him to understanding and using his gifts, and so much more! Be sure to mark your calendars now for what promises to be a very powerful show!

Christopher Reburn | John Holland | Mediums | The Spirit Whisperer | Chronicles of a Medium

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES CELEBRATED INTUITIVE COLETTE BARON-REID TO THE SHOW! - Apr 28,2010
item.description:
The Amazing & Incomparable COLETTE BARON-REID Celebrated Spiritual Intuitive, Psychic Medium & Bestselling Author! Colette Baron-Reid is an internationally renowned intuitive counselor, educator and best-selling Hay House author who helps others recognize and connect with their own intuition, potential and purpose. Powerful motivational speaker, charismatic broadcast personality, and acclaimed performer, storyteller and recording artist, Colette uses her extraordinary spiritual gifts to empower her clients to live a life that is “awake and authentic”, and to create a reality that is spiritual, deliberate and meaningful. Passionate about people, Colette’s work as an intuitive and medium is to help individuals see the magic and meaning in the Story of their lives. She has brought her message of hope, healing and humor to audiences of thousands in 150 cities across North America, Europe and the UK. Her popular books and audio programs are found worldwide. Remembering The Future, Messages From Spirit, The Wisdom of Avalon, and Wisdom of the Hidden Realms have been translated into Japanese, Russian, French, Slovenian, Polish, Czech and German. Her newest book, The Enchanted Map of You and companion oracle cards will be released Jan 2011. This promises to be one of the most powerful shows of 2010 that you wont want to miss when Christopher welcomes Colette to the show for the very first time!

item.title: SPEND SOME HEALING TIME WITH YOUR ANGELS with CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Apr 25,2010
item.description:
Everyone on God's earthly plane is going through something difficult, whether it be insecurities for the future, the current economic status, or an upcoming crossroads. These are the times when we should really be focusing more time to spend on healing time with our Angels. I'm going to share with you some techniques on how you can communicate with your Angels for specific healings, and why it's important to choose particular Angels based on the healing you are requesting and so much more! Angels help keep us going, they protect us, they empower us, and most importantly, they love us so much and they never give up on us, even if we occasionally might give up on ourselves during a difficult part of life! Listen in for a very special angel healing conversation!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BACK MEDIUM MARK ANTHONY TO THE SHOW! - Apr 24,2010
item.description:
Two Great Mediums Together Again! Join Christopher as he welcomes back MARK ANTHONY Psychic Medium, Healer & known to his legion of follwers as 'The Psychic Lawyer' Mark Anthony the “Psychic Lawyer” is a practicing medium who specializes in communication with spirits. He is descended from a long line of psychically gifted people. For over a century the psychics and mediums in his family have used their gifts to help people. Mr. Anthony is also a successful attorney, licensed to practice law in Florida, Washington D.C., and before the United States Supreme Court. He earned his law degree from Mercer University in Georgia and studied law at Oxford University, England. Mark is a published author who has written several articles on both law and metaphysical phenomenon. His upcoming book “Sprits to the Rescue” is about healing grief with help from the Other Side. He is an accomplished public speaker who regularly discusses Life after Death and Contact with the Spirit World. He appears world wide on radio and television as an expert in spirit contact and the paranormal. He often serves as a guest lecturer at universities, civic, religious, spiritual, and grief support groups. Mark last appeared on 'Conversations with Christopher' in October 2009 for a very powerful discussion with Christopher that was enjoyed by all. Don't miss this show when Christopher welcomes Mark back to the show to talk about growing up with the gift, how our mediumship gifts expand and become stronger with age and experience, and some common misconceptions some people have about psychics and mediums, and much more!

Christopher Reburn | Mark Anthony | The Psychic Lawyer | Psychic Medium | Healing

item.title: DISCOVERING YOUR TRUE SPIRITUAL SELF & GIFTS w/ PSYCHIC & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Mar 13,2010
item.description:
So many people are confused as to who they really are in their spiritual soul, they are unsure of their spiritual direction and have many questions on how to advance and what to do next. Some people dont know what gifts they have or how they can develop them. I'll be answering your questions on your spiritual gifts and questions regarding your spiritual journey and progression during this show -- so be sure to write down any questions you have and call in and ask them during the show! (Note: this is not a psychic readings show!) Discover your true spiritual self by embracing your spiritual journey and begin using your God-given gifts to help the universe! I'll also share with you some of my earlier years experiences with my own gifts and how my gifts have become stronger with maturity and experience.

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES HEALER APOTHECARY JERI TO THE SHOW! - Feb 28,2010
item.description:
Making her 'Conversations' debut! APOTHECARY JERI Spiritual Healer, Health & Wellness Advocate & Alternative Health Care Provider Jeri Hemerlein, known to her legion of followers as 'Apothecary Jeri', lives by a simple philosophy 'Enhance and expand your energy bodies' and it's been her life mission to help others heal with her proven techniques and alternative healing remedies for years. In her own words 'Im what I like to call a "doula" for flowers and other energies that are infused in water by forces of nature under the direction and guidance of Spirit.' Jeri comes from a long line of healers in her family and is now living out alot of her grandmother's own spiritual desires in helping to heal others. She is the Founder, Director and home to Heirloom Remedy Nature Essences and works in dedicated service to Spirit and Nature to bring you 'energy in a bottle' which incorporate the various Nature Essences (Flower, Earthen, and Elemental) and specific elixirs which address particular issues that need attention. This has been a show a long time in the making and an endearing conversation between two friends that you wont want to miss!

Christopher Reburn | Apothecary Jeri | Healing Remedies | Heirloom Remedy Nature Essences | Alternative Healing

item.title: SOUL REACTIVATION & MANIFESTING PROSPERITY w/ PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Feb 21,2010
item.description:
I want to talk about something my Guides have shared with me called soul reactivation. Through life's many discouraging events, we can lose sight of ourselves and focus so much of our daily time and efforts on many other people, often getting us off track and causing delays in our own spiritual progression and advancement, which also results in our soul becaming exhausted and overwhelmed. I've been using these techniques that I channeled through my Guides for the last few years, and the results are truly amazing, and now I feel comfortable sharing them with you, to help you alongside your spiritual journey. I'll also be talking about ways you can manifest more positive events and prosperity in your life through positive visualization and asking for specific blessings from your Guides & Angels! Join me for an exciting show that will help you get back to your spiritual basics and cleanse your soul like you've never experienced before!

item.title: GETTING IN TOUCH WITH YOUR PAST LIVES with PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Feb 20,2010
item.description:
We have all lived past lives, many of us have lived several past lives and are currently on our last life on this earthly plane. We are all fascinated by our past lives because as spiritual beings, we are constantly hungry for more knowledge and answers from our past lives which can be very helpful to us in our current lifetime right now. Listen as I explain some exercises on how you can tap into some of your past lives through astral projection, dream travel and meditation. These exercises have helped my client friends the world over get more in touch with who they were before in past lives and why they may be going through some of life's common hardships in this current lifetime. I hope you'll join me for what promises to be an exciting journey into some of your past lives which may give some present answers!

Christopher Reburn | Past Lives | Discovering Your Past Lives | Understanding Your Past Lives | Letting Go of Past Life Trauma

We have all lived past lives, many of us have lived several past lives and are currently on our last life on this earthly plane. We are all fascinated by our past lives because as spiritual beings, we are constantly hungry for more knowledge and answers from our past lives which can be very helpful to us in our current lifetime right now. Listen as I explain some exercises on how you can tap into some of your past lives through astral projection, dream travel and meditation. These exercises have helped my client friends the world over get more in touch with who they were before in past lives and why they may be going through some of life's common hardships in this current lifetime. I hope you'll join me for what promises to be an exciting journey into some of your past lives which may give some present answers!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES SPIRITUAL HEALER & AUTHOR DR. PATTI DIAMOND TO THE SHOW - Feb 20,2010
item.description:
An Evening of Spiritual Oneness! DR. PATTI DIAMOND Celebrated Author, Psychic & Healer Author of 'Stepping Into Spiritual Oneness' Dr. Patti "Diamondlady" Diamond, DD, is an author, speaker, and spiritual mentor within the resonance of Spiritual Oneness. She is currently the author of two books, "Life Long Learning: Transforming Learning" and "Stepping Into Spiritual Oneness: Spiritual Rememberings of the Soul Through Life Experience". She is a Spiritual Medium, Spiritual Mentor, Visionary, and has been gifted by Spirit as an Ascended Master and has been gifted with a Doctorate in Divinity through Universal Ministries. As a clear conduit of the Divine, Patti channels the wisdom of Spirit within Multi~Dimensional ways to inspire each soul to develop their own inner voice of the soul of who they are and brings the gifts of Infinite Healing, Absoulute Love or Soulful Love, Light, and Peace to all whom she inspires. She is the “Diamondlady”, the soul who brings forth the Diamond energy of Lemuria to this earth within infinite ways. She enkindles souls to experience the light within their soulful being and facilitates Spiritual Oneness Partnership by empowering all souls to connect with, trust in, and follow their own souls guidance free from the illusions of limiting beliefs. Patti's Healing Light seeks to remind us that when you live from your heart, your soul guides you rather than the illusion of this earth dimension we call as fear and doubt. To be living from your heart, from your soul, and your intuition, free from limitation, is to bring Bliss and Absoulute Love into your life. Join Christopher Reburn as he welcomes his good friend Patti Diamond to the show for the very first time!

item.title: RECEIVING MESSAGES FROM YOUR ANGELS with PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Feb 14,2010
item.description:
In keeping with our Angelic theme weekend of shows, I want to talk more about ways you can communicate with your Angels, how our beloved Angels communicate with us, signs from our Angels, and how you can hear the messages and see the signs! Our Angels surround us each and every day for protection, guidance and healing. Whether we are going a difficult period in our life, or if we are having the time of our life, our Angels are always there -- through the laughter and through the tears! Listen as I share some ways on how you can connect with your Angels, and share some of my knowledge on Angels, including how many Angels a person has, why some people have more than others, and how Angels come to the aide of the sick and dying and help walk them Home to God. Don't miss this angelic discussion that is sure to help you on your continued spiritual journey of enlightenment and discovery!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BESTSELLING AUTHOR LORNA BYRNE TO THE SHOW! - Feb 13,2010
item.description:
A show you won't want to miss! Bestselling Author LORNA BYRNE Author of 'Angels In My Hair' Lorna Byrne has been seeing and talking to angels since she was a baby. Now, having raised her family, she talks openly for the first time about what she has seen and learned. This decision led to her book 'Angels In My Hair', published in May 2008 which has become an international bestseller. She lives quietly in rural Ireland. For anyone who has ever wondered about the mysteries that lie beyond everyday experience, or doubted the reality of the afterlife, 'Angels in My Hair' is a moving and deeply inspirational journey into the unseen world. For as long as she can remember, Lorna Byrne has seen angels. As a young child, she assumed everyone could see the otherworldly beings who always accompanied her. Yet in the eyes of adults, her abnormal behavior was a symptom of mental deficiency. Today, sick and troubled people from around the world are drawn to her for comfort and healing, and even theologians of different faiths seek her guidance. Lorna is trusted for her ability to communicate with spirits and angels—and by sharing her intimate knowledge of the spiritual world she offers a message of hope and love to us all. In this uplifting autobiography, a modern-day Irish mystic shares her vivid encounters and conversations with the angels and spirits she has known her entire life. Don't miss this very special show with a very special lady as Christopher welcomes the incomparable Lorna Byrne to the show for the very first time!

Christopher Reburn | Lorna Byrne | Angels In My Hair | Angels | Angel Communication

item.title: YOUR LIFE PATH & PURPOSE FOR 2010 WITH PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Feb 13,2010
item.description:
Are you unsure what your life purpose is? Are you confused with your spirituality and gifts and not sure which way to go in 2010? We all have a life purpose for each and every year we are in. Each year, we are meant to discover what that purpose is and how we can better our spiritual journey of positive living with life improvements, some of which are designed to be simple, whereas others are long term goals that will take awhile to manifest. Listen as I share some ways on how you can figure out your life purpose for 2010 is. This will also help you discover (or possibly, rediscover) your life plan and reason for being here for this entire lifetime. We all have a reason for being here as lightworkers, sometimes we just need to refresh and awaken our spiritual souls with the knowledge that is already there within us. Join me for a journey into your soul!

item.title: EMBRACING CHANGE & WELCOMING NEW SPIRITUAL BEGINNINGS with CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Feb 07,2010
item.description:
With the New Year now upon us, listen as I talk about ways on how you can more easily embrace change and how to be open to new spiritual beginnings. Some people start a new year with many insecurities and unlogical goals which is a good way to set yourself up to fail. Listen as I share with you some of my own techniques and exercises and why CHANGE IS GOOD!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES BESTSELLING AUTHOR BROOK NOEL TO THE SHOW! - Feb 06,2010
item.description:
For the first time on BlogTalkRadio Bestselling Author BROOK NOEL Author of 'I Wasn't Ready To Say Goodbye: Surviving, Coping and Healing After The Sudden Death of a Loved One' Each year about eight million Americans suffer the death of someone close to them. Now for those who face the challenges of sudden death, there is a hand to hold, written by two women who have experienced sudden loss. This best-selling bereavement classic will touch, comfort, uplift and console. Authors Brook Noel and Pamela D. Blair, Ph.D. explore sudden death and offers a comforting hand to hold for those who are grieving the sudden death of a loved one. Featured on ABC World News, Fox and Friends and many other shows, this book acts as a touchstone of sanity through difficult times. I Wasn't Ready to Say Goodbye covers such difficult topics as the first few weeks, suicide, death of a child, children and grief, funerals and rituals, physical effects, homicide and depression. It also covers the unique circumstances of loss, men and women's grieving styles, religion and faith, myths and misunderstandings, I Wasn't Ready to Say Goodbye reflects the shifting face of grief. This book has offered solace to over eighty thousand people, ranging from seniors to teenagers and from the newly bereaved to those who lost a loved one years ago. Individuals engulfed by the immediate aftermath will find a special chapter covering the first few weeks. Join Christopher as he welcomes Brook to the show for the very first time to talk about her book, getting through grief, healing through the loss and ways of dealing with the loss of a loved one. Visit Brook Noel online at http://www.brooknoel.com

Christopher Reburn | Brook Noel | I Wasnt Ready To Say Goodbye | Surviving Grief | Losing a Loved One

item.title: Finding Time To Be Spiritual with Psychic Medium & Spiritual Teacher Christopher Reburn - Jan 30,2010
item.description:
With everyone leading busy lives, sometimes it's very difficult to find time to be spiritual and work on your spiritual gifts and goals. Listen as I share some easy ways on how you can manage a busy life without losing track of your spiritual journey, goals and gifts. Taking time out to focus on meditation and your spirituality during difficult times (such as those we are in) helps one stay focused, grounded, hopeful and positive for whats to come. My motto has always been 'There's 24 hours in day, I've got five minutes for anything' whenever I've heard someone else say 'I dont have the time in my schedule'. The answer is YES you do! Listen to this special conversation to learn more and how to better balance your hectic life with your spirituality!

item.title: Your Spiritual Goals for 2010 with Psychic Medium & Spiritual Teacher Christopher Reburn - Jan 24,2010
item.description:
The beginning of a new year is upon us and it's time to look at what our spiritual goals for 2010 should be! What did you accomplish spiritually in 2009? What are you looking to accomplish spiritually in 2010? Communicating clearer with your Guides? Understanding your psychic gifts? Being able to maintain a stronger connection with The Other Side? Improving positive visualization skills? There are so many wonderful opportunities that we are given spiritually to learn, progress and share with each other! Finding and following through with those goals doesn't have to be a difficult process. Listen as I share some ways on how you can determine your goals, set reasonable timeframes and expectations to prevent failure, and how to spiritually celebrate when you see your goals coming to fruition! Join me in what promises to be a great show full of learning!

Christopher Reburn | Spiritual Goals | Keeping New Years Resolutions | Making Goals | Following Through with Your Goals
