item.title: INFINITE SPIRITUAL POSSIBILITIES ARE WITHIN YOU with PSYCHIC & SPIRITUALTEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jan 23,2010
item.description:
Do you know how gifted you are? Do you know about what gifts you may have but are unsure how to use them? For some who are just learning how to use their gifts to those who are seasoned pros, it's spiritually healthy to evaluate your spiritual goals often as it helps to keep your gifts running strong, centered and focused. Listen as I talk about how you can open up to your full spiritual potential by letting go of some insecurities and anxieties that may be blocking you, and how you can tell which gifts you have, and the best way to begin using your gifts, and so much more. Happy Holidays to all of my friendly listeners!

Christopher Reburn | Spirituality | Emotional Healing | Spirituality | Spiritual Success

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN PROUDLY WELCOMES BACK CELEBRATED MEDIUM & CLAIRVOYANT LISA WILLIAMS TO THE SHOW! - Dec 17,2009
item.description:
Celebrated Medium & Clairvoyant Lisa Williams Star of Lifetime TV's 'Lisa Williams: Voices from the Other Side' and also 'Lisa Williams: Life Among the Dead' BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND! Lisa last appeared on 'Conversations with Christopher' in August 2009, and now she's back for another amazing show. Christopher and Lisa had such a great time in August that Lisa has gifted us some more time with her once again! Having just completed a sold-out UK, Australian and New Zealand tour with lots of traveling and sight-seeing, Lisa will have lots to share with us on how spirituality is in these parts of the world. We'll also talk about her new Hay House radio show, her 'Life Among The Dead' book and TV show on Lifetime, and we'll chat about some of Lisa's earlier spiritual experiences and what gives her the constant strength and courage to continue her spiritual journey and so much more! When Lisa Williams was a little girl, she discovered she had a gift. Communicating with those who are no longer with us. Some people say what she does is scary other people say she change their lives. Lisa just says what she hears and sees and she sees a lot. Lisa's personal 'spiritual' journey has been an exciting and rewarding one. She had to go through many life-changing experiences to understand what her calling was in life. Lisa Williams is now able to share her gifts with you through large audience readings on her various lecture tours and her new TV show, Lisa Williams: Voices from the Other Side and also Lisa Williams: Life Among the Dead. Don't miss this exciting conversation as Christopher welcomes back one of today's most sought after and leading mediums to the show for an informative hour conversation on all things Lisa and all things spiritual!!

Christopher Reburn | Lisa Williams | Psychic Medium | Life Among The Dead | Clairvoyant

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN PROUDLY WELCOMES BACK HEALER & MEDICAL INTUITIVE SHERRY DMYTREWYCZ TO THE SHOW! - Dec 13,2009
item.description:
Don't miss this very special event as Christopher welcomes his very good friend Sherry back to the show for another discussion on healing and spirituality! Sherry Dmytrewycz is a gifted and dedicated medical intuitive, as well as a conduit for a variety of energy healing modalities. She is a wife, mother of two sons and former elementary school teacher. She spent several years as a remedial reading and math teacher, working with students with learning difficulties, before deciding to explore, develop and use her healing gifts. She has traveled extensively and has lived in Pakistan, Tunisia, the former Soviet Union and Panama. Sherry believes that we can heal ourselves, but that we can also benefit from assistance in recognizing and releasing thought patterns or habits that are keeping us from moving forward in our lives. To foster self-healing, she shares suggestions with her clients to assist them in bringing their bodies back into balance. Sherry receives information from Spirit in a variety of ways. She is empathic (understands another’s situation, feelings, and motives), clairvoyant (sees objects or events not perceived by the senses), clairsentient (feels things not normally felt by most people) and clairaudient (hears Spiritual communication outside the range of normal perception). Her intuitive skills often give her a look at the inner organs of the body and the emotional base causing the body to be out of balance. With Spiritual Response Technique, she taps into the Akashik Records to clear past life issues that are affecting this lifetime. With Energy Alignment, she brings the physical body back into alignment and works on all the organs and glands.

Christopher Reburn | Sherry Dmytrewycz | Healing | Medical Intuitive | Different Forms of Healing

item.title: LETTING GO OF PAST PAIN & TRAUMA with PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Dec 12,2009
item.description:
Whether it be from a past life or our current life, chances are everyone has some pain or trauma that they'd like to let go of and be free from it! Listen as I share some ways on you have call on your spirituality and yourself to help with the healing process and letting go from the past and focusing more on the future. Healing the past and the present is important so that one's positive future is not impacted on the active pain and trauma that is currently there. I'll also be talking more about self-healing, and how you can heal yourself during this show!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN PROUDLY WELCOMES BACK AUTHOR & ANNA NICOLE SMITH's BEST FRIEND MISSY BYRUM! - Dec 12,2009
item.description:
Missy Byrum wrote the bestselling 'When You Wished Upon A Star: The Evolution of Anna Nicole Smith' and has received glowing reviews for her detailed account of her close friendship with Anna Nicole. It's been several months since Missy's last appearance on 'Conversations with Christopher' and I'm so excited that she'll be back with us once again for another wonderful discussion about her book about Anna Nicole and some never-before-told memories and stories that she'll be sharing with us, including some holiday memories of Anna that will warm your heart as we celebrate once again the lifetime of this beloved icon with her best friend. Don't miss this heartwarming episode as Christopher welcomes back is good friend Missy Byrum to the show once again!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN PROUDLY WELCOMES BACK AUTHOR RICHARD SCHEINBERG TO THE SHOW! - Dec 11,2009
item.description:
Christopher welcomes his friend and author Richard Scheinberg back to the show for another amazing evening of conversation! During this show, listen as we talk about Richard's book 'Turning Trauma Into Triumph', how you can turn your own trauma into triumph, ways to let go of the fears, the past and so much more. When Richard last appeared on 'Conversations with Christopher' in October, the whole hour flew by! What if someone told you that the most difficult period in your life may be a blessing in disguise? As a psychotherapist with 25 years of experience, Richard C. Scheinberg has candidly and succinctly summarized the spiritual and deeply personal transformation of ten people attempting to overcome the worst challenges of their lives. In this inspirational book, Scheinberg also reveals how he survived the most difficult periods in his own life. Furthermore, he conveys his personal conviction that our common strengths emanate from a source more powerful than any challenges that may come our way. ABOUT THE AUTHOR RICHARD C. SCHEINBERG is a New York State Licensed Clinical Social Worker and he is recognized nationally as a Board Certified Diplomate in clinical social work. Scheinberg has twenty-eight years of professional experience and he is currently the Director of Sunrise Counseling Center, located in Bay Shore, New York, which is a mental health agency he opened in 1993. Aside from being a human resource specialist for community organizations and employee assistance programs, Scheinberg continues to serve as a seminar developer, workshop leader, and business consultant locally and nationally. Don't miss what this great evening with Christopher & Richard!

Christopher Reburn | Richard Scheinberg | Turning Trauma Into Triumph | Stories of Hope | Stories of Growth

item.title: THE SPIRITUAL WILL TO CHANGE with PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Dec 05,2009
item.description:
Sometimes the hardest decision one has to make is to change their life and gear it towards a more positive direction and promising future. Having the spiritual will to change allows you to look deeper into problems and situations to get clearer insights and instincts. Listen as I share some ways on how you find your own strength and courage deep within your heart and soul, and how the spiritual will to change can increase your spirituality, positive energy and so much more!

item.title: 2010 PREDICTIONS SHOW WITH PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Nov 29,2009
item.description:
It's that time of year again! Every November since I can remember, I've always put out my predictions and general forecast for the following year. This is going to be a great show with some positive predictions and some not-so-positive ones. I am always very much to the point with my predictions as they are meant to prepare, prehelp and preheal whenever possible. I'll be talking about what we can expect with the economy, stock market, weather predictions, gas prices, Barack Obama, storm predictions, immigration laws predictions, travel warnings, plane warnings and the news that everyone is waiting for -- more information on the positive universal shifts that are forthcoming. What's a prediction show without dropping a few celebrity predictions? I'll also be talking about many of my 2009 predictions that have already been validated and some past ones, too! Join me on my annual predictions show for some insight into 2010 and beyond!

Christopher Reburn | Christopher Reburn 2010 Predictions | Christopher Reburns 2010 Predictions | Christopher Reburns 2010 Forecast | Psychic Predictions for 2010

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN PROUDLY WELCOMES BACK AUTHOR & ANIMAL COMMUNICATOR BETHANNE ELION TO THE SHOW! - Nov 28,2009
item.description:
CALLING ALL PET LOVERS! :) When I had my friend Bethanne Elion on the show in September, the hour flew by so fast and there was so much left to talk about. Listeners loved her and I'm proud to welcome her back to the show for another discussion on animal communication, great holiday gift ideas for your furry friend, animal welfare, things that every pet owner should know, communicating more with your pet, becoming more intuitive about your pet, communicating with your pet on The Other Side and so much more. I'll also share some of my favorite chapters and notes from Bethanne's wonderful book, Memoirs of The Bathtub Psychic: A True Story of a Clairvoyant & Her Dogs. Bethanne is a dear friend and with us both so busy, this will be a long-awaited reunion! Join us for a excellent conversation not to be missed!

item.title: EMOTIONAL HEALING TO HEAL YOUR LIFE WITH PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Nov 08,2009
item.description:
We all need healing and different times of our life when different events come our way. Sometimes we forget that we, ourself, need healing, too! Certain events in life that we go through can leave emotional scarring -- including loss of a loved one or pet, a difficult breakup, losing a job, losing a home and so on. Some of these obstacles can also prevent one from progressing forward with their spiritual journey. Listen as I share some ways to get to the heart of the issue, how to deal with it, how to heal yourself fully and then move on. This will be a very healing conversation that is geared to help so many people in the world going through their own sad and difficult times. Visit my prayer and healing center on my website to request prayers, healings and blessings at http://www.thepsychicspirit.com/prayerforum.html

item.description:
It's that time again for another great conversation about Spirit Guides! This is always a great show when we get to hang out and talk about our Guides. It's one of my very favorite topics and I know it's one of yours, too! Our Guides do so much for us and are so much a part of our active daily lives. They are responsible for keeping us positive and sane, and they also provide healing for us when the going gets tough. Listen as I share some ways on how you can improve your connection with your Guide, hear clearer messages from your guides and what the perfect holiday present would be to give your guides this holiday season. Don't miss this informative spiritual conversation all about your spirit guides!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES AUTHOR GUY DUSSEAULT TO THE SHOW - Nov 07,2009
item.description:
On a beautiful Sunday morning at around 10 a.m husband Guy and wife Jo-Anne's lives would be changed forever. The date was June 27th, 2004. On that day they got the most devastating news any parent could ever receive, that one of their children has died. Their son, Billy was killed when his ATV he was riding at night hit a tree. He died instantly. He was found by passers by who were on their way to breakfast. About twenty feet from the road. He spent the night there because no one saw him, it was too dark. Guy wrote the book 'Signs From Our Loved Ones: Our Son Billy'. This book doesnt deal with the story of how Guy and Jo-Anne dealt with the loss of their son, but instead what happened about 10 months after the passing of their beloved son, Billy. About 10 months after Billy died, Guy began to notice he was able to take some pretty unusual pictures. Guy found out later on that he was able to take these photographs for a reason, to let everyone know that our loved ones are with us now and always. These amazing photos within the book show you the different ways that Spirits can and do appear. Billy has given Guy & Jo-Anne so many signs. The book shows you some of them. In a very rare interview, listen as Christopher talks with Guy about this book, the orb photos and the signs that Billy still shows his parents to this day, how this has offered healing to both of them, and much more. Proceeds for this book will go to a scholarship fund in the name of Billy A. Dusseault. You can visit these websites to see some of the pictures and to purchase this wonderful book of amazing Spirit photos at http://www.oursonbilly.com and also http://www.signsfromourlovedones.com This will be a very moving episode that you won't want to miss!

Christopher Reburn | Guy Dusseault | Signs From Our Loved Ones Our Son Billy | Orbs | Loved Ones in Heaven

item.title: EXCUSES & DELAYS: HOW WE MANIFEST THEM with PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Nov 01,2009
item.description:
Sometimes in life it might seem easier to provide an excuse or set forth a delay in making a major life decision. Sometimes our own insecurities and anxieties can create and fully manifest delays in our own personal and spiritual growth because of our excuses or negative thinking. Listen as I share some ways on how you can avoid this and focus more on following through on your spiritual goals and life work. There's always going to be some level of insecurity or anxiety in life, that's human nature, but listen as I share ways on how you can limit these in your daily active life and be happier and more positive.

item.description:

Expect the unexpected, and dont be surprised if you capture an EVP or four when these two great spiritually active friends get together. item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES AUTHOR RICHARD SCHEINBERG TO THE SHOW - Oct 31,2009
item.description:
Consider for a moment that life is not a random event or an accident of circumstance and that the essence of who we are continues, even beyond death. In his book 'Seeking Soul Mates, Spirit Guides, and Past Lives', we can discover new meaning to our lives and garner valuable insights into our experiences! With an artful blend of scientific research and heartrending narratives, this book demonstrates how we can recognize and embrace the spiritual relationships that determine our life’s path. Taking us on a journey, illustrated by his professional and personal experiences, Mr. Scheinberg offers us a fresh and intimate glimpse of the fascinating unseen world of eternal love and the enduring soul. And in so doing, he encourages and inspires us to embark on a soul searching expedition of our own. Mr. Scheinberg, a psychotherapist with twenty-eight years in private practice helping children, adults, couples, and families, is the director of Sunrise Counseling Center in Bay Shore, Long Island, New York. Founded by Mr. Scheinberg in 1993, the Center now has a staff of 24 clinical practitioners serving 1000 people each month. As Mr. Scheinberg has evolved spiritually, he has chosen to devote more time and energy to professional development that is directly associated with what one may call “the life force”. This research has included a wide range of training involving mystical and energy practices that relate to life, love, karma, and overall mind-body health. These experiences include ancient and modern forms of meditation, prayer, hypnotism, chakra clearing, psychic development, angel communication, mediumship, remote viewing, and alternative healing modalities (Reiki and Reconnective healing). This promises to be an amazingly powerful show! Don't miss it!

Christopher Reburn | Richard Scheinberg | Seeking Soul Mates Spirit Guides Past Lives | Spiritual Author | Spiritual Teacher

item.title: EMBRACING YOUR UNIQUENESS WITH PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Oct 31,2009
item.description:
For some people, it's hard for them to embrace who they are on the inside. We play many parts during the journey of life, and sometimes it's difficult to be who we really want to be, and for that side of us to be set free and to no longer stay hidden. Should you celebrate your uniqueness? Should you cherish it? YES! YES! YES! We are all different in our own special ways which is what makes us unique. Listen as I share some ways on how you can come out of your shell and embrace who you really are, and how your spirituality will strengthen as a result of it! I'll also answer your questions on this topic as well, and much more!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES HEALER & MEDICAL INTUITIVE SHERRY DMYTREWYCZ - Oct 24,2009
item.description:
Sherry Dmytrewycz is a gifted and dedicated medical intuitive, as well as a conduit for a variety of energy healing modalities. She is a wife, mother of two sons and former elementary school teacher. She spent several years as a remedial reading and math teacher, working with students with learning difficulties, before deciding to explore, develop and use her healing gifts. She has traveled extensively and has lived in Pakistan, Tunisia, the former Soviet Union and Panama. Sherry believes that we can heal ourselves, but that we can also benefit from assistance in recognizing and releasing thought patterns or habits that are keeping us from moving forward in our lives. To foster self-healing, she shares suggestions with her clients to assist them in bringing their bodies back into balance. Sherry receives information from Spirit in a variety of ways. She is empathic (understands another’s situation, feelings, and motives), clairvoyant (sees objects or events not perceived by the senses), clairsentient (feels things not normally felt by most people) and clairaudient (hears Spiritual communication outside the range of normal perception). Her intuitive skills often give her a look at the inner organs of the body and the emotional base causing the body to be out of balance. With Spiritual Response Technique, she taps into the Akashik Records to clear past life issues that are affecting this lifetime. With Energy Alignment, she brings the physical body back into alignment and works on all the organs and glands. Often a particular colored symbol is combined with a frequency, herb or flower essence and energetically applied to foster the healing of specific physical disturbances, mental, emotional or spiritual issues, and energy blockages. Don't miss this very special event as Christopher welcomes his very good friend Sherry to the show!

Christopher Reburn | Sherry Dmytrewycz | Spiritual Healing | Healing | Medical Intuitive

She is a wife, mother of two sons and former elementary school teacher. She spent several years as a remedial reading and math teacher, working with students with learning difficulties, before deciding to explore, develop and use her healing gifts. She has traveled extensively and has lived in Pakistan, Tunisia, the former Soviet Union and Panama. Sherry believes that we can heal ourselves, but that we can also benefit from assistance in recognizing and releasing thought patterns or habits that are keeping us from moving forward in our lives. To foster self-healing, she shares suggestions with her clients to assist them in bringing their bodies back into balance. Sherry receives information from Spirit in a variety of ways. She is empathic (understands another’s situation, feelings, and motives), clairvoyant (sees objects or events not perceived by the senses), clairsentient (feels things not normally felt by most people) and clairaudient (hears Spiritual communication outside the range of normal perception). Her intuitive skills often give her a look at the inner organs of the body and the emotional base causing the body to be out of balance. With Spiritual Response Technique, she taps into the Akashik Records to clear past life issues that are affecting this lifetime. With Energy Alignment, she brings the physical body back into alignment and works on all the organs and glands. Often a particular colored symbol is combined with a frequency, herb or flower essence and energetically applied to foster the healing of specific physical disturbances, mental, emotional or spiritual issues, and energy blockages. Don't miss this very special event as Christopher welcomes his very good friend Sherry to the show!

I'll also share some exercises on how you can embrace your own inner self and reinvent your spiritual self to be even stronger, and some ways on how you can avoid getting ripped off from some of the more commercial aspects of the spiritual field. item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES MEDIUM MARK ANTHONY TO THE SHOW! - Oct 17,2009
item.description:
Mark Anthony the “Psychic Lawyer” is a practicing medium who specializes in communication with spirits. He is descended from a long line of psychically gifted people. For over a century the psychics and mediums in his family have used their gifts to help people. Mr. Anthony is also a successful attorney, licensed to practice law in Florida, Washington D.C., and before the United States Supreme Court. He earned his law degree from Mercer University in Georgia and studied law at Oxford University, England. Mark is a published author who has written several articles on both law and metaphysical phenomenon. His upcoming book “Sprits to the Rescue” is about healing grief with help from the Other Side. He is an accomplished public speaker who regularly discusses Life after Death and Contact with the Spirit World. He appears world wide on radio and television as an expert in spirit contact and the paranormal. He often serves as a guest lecturer at universities, civic, religious, spiritual, and grief support groups. Don't miss this show when Christopher welcomes Mark to the show to talk about his life as a medium, growing up with the gift and what his spiritual hopes and plans are for the future.

Christopher Reburn | Mark Anthony | Psychic Medium | Spirituality | Spiritual Teacher

item.title: REMOVING BLOCKS & INSECURITIES WITH PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Oct 17,2009
item.description:
There are many reasons why a person can manifest their own blocks and insecurities. Most times they may be brought on by one's own fear of a situation, and can also be brought on by another person or a group of people. Regardless of how one gets blocked or insecure, I want to share with you some ways on how you can get rid of any blocks and insecurities that may be preventing you from finding happiness and being the positive person you used to be! We all have setbacks, that's life, but I have some great methods that will help you release tension and stress which will allow you to gain further insight into your spiritual gifts and how you can use them with a cleared, cleansed and well balanced soul and Spirit! Your calls and much more!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN PROUDLY WELCOMES BACK SPIRITUAL AUTHOR WD ALLAN TO THE SHOW - Oct 03,2009
item.description:
Spiritual Author of the book 'Spirituality for the Moment' WD ALLAN returns to the show by overwhelming popular demand!! If you caught WD's appearance on the show in July 2009, you'll likely remember what a powerful show this was as Christopher welcomed him to the show for the very first time in his first-ever on-air exclusive interview! And now Christopher is proud to welcome his good friend WD ALLAN back to the show again for what will surely be a series of frequent appearances on the show! Spirituality For The Moment is a new and innovative look into the many facets of peoples beliefs in anything tied to their thought and places definitive thinking into a completely varied perspective for the reader. The author asks questions of these themes in a wide ranging attempt to spark both the reader's thoughts with regard to these personal sense of spirituality in their lives. This vision of growth, change and betterment takes an inclusive look at many different themes of spiritual different spiritual principles as well as using the facilitator of the open-ended question as a means to help bring the reader to their own conclusions of these varied yet all encompassing concepts of belief. The book's authur, W.D. Allan, spends his time writing and helping people as much as he can, and has dedicated himself to the pursuits of seeking spiritual ideals as a way of life and of helping others to do the same whenever anyone seeks such a discussion in their life. Go to http://www.spiritualitymoment.com to lear more about WD Allan. Join Christopher as he welcomes WD Allan back to the show for another conversation on 'Spirituality For The Moment', the future of spirituality, and many thought provoking topics on the spirituality and new age movement. This will be one of those shows that you will not want to miss!

item.title: DEFINING YOUR LIFE PATH, PURPOSE & MISSION w/ PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Sep 26,2009
item.description:
Life can be so busy at times with various trials and tribulations that one can forget what they are truly here for. Your Life Mission is what has brought you here into this specific lifetime and it helps define the inner depths of your soul. What spiritual gifts do you have? Are you using them to help others as much as possible? Most times the gifts that you've come into this lifetime with have a very strong impact on your life path and mission. Listen as I share ways on you can define your life purpose and life path, and to make sure you are staying on track with your life mission and ways to understand why we are here in the first place!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES AUTHOR & ANIMAL COMMUNICATOR BETHANNE ELION TO THE SHOW! - Sep 12,2009
item.description:
Bethanne Elion is a gifted clairvoyant and animal communicator and is celebrating the release of her new book 'Memoirs of the Bathtub Psychic: The True Story of a Clairvoyant and Her Dogs' This book is the heartwarming true story of her relationship with her Newfoundland dogs, Sophie, Emma and Cubby. These “barking bears” teach her to trust her natural psychic ability, which leads to the discovery of a talent for animal communication and healing. Afraid to acknowledge her instincts due to negative experiences as a child, a deep love for her dogs motivates Bethanne to open her mind and take unusual steps to improve their lives when they fall ill. She begins to suspect that some conventional veterinary practices, especially vaccinations, may have actually caused her pets’ serious health problems. Following her intuition and signals provided by her dogs and the Universe, she starts down the path toward holistic medicine. By opening the channel to psychic communication, Bethanne receives information about her previous incarnations and the lessons she must learn in her current lifetime. An enlightening relationship develops with her spirit guide (and love from a past life), a Native American entity named Gray Wolf who offers wisdom at key moments. She does psychic readings for farmers and pet owners while relaxing in the bathtub, when her third eye is open and important clues for her clients’ healing are revealed. A compelling read for all animal lovers, this book will be of special interest to pet owners interested in holistic health, organic raw food canine nutrition, and critics of excessive vaccination. Don't miss this powerful episode when Christopher welcomes Bethanne Elion to the show!

item.title: 9/11: 8 YEARS LATER! AN EVENING OF REMEMBRANCE, LOVE & HEALING WITH PSYCHIC CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Sep 12,2009
item.description:
Join us as we remember those we lost eight years ago during our nation's worst tragedy. Let us all come together to partake in an evening of remembrance and healing as we pay tribute to all of those who lost their lives in 9/11, and all of the fallen heroes, friends, family and pets we've lost that meant so much to us. Join me for a celebration of life, and to give blessings to all of those whom we hold dear to our heart. Your prayers and healing requests will be taken during this show, plus your calls and engaging stories!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES AUTHOR & SHAMANIC HEALER TRISH BISHOP TO THE SHOW - Sep 11,2009
item.description:
Trish Bishop is the author of "The Question Journey". She is also a Shamanic Healer and Intuitive Guide living on Vancouver Island, BC. Are you truly ready to shut down the little voice in your head and move towards the whisperings of your heart's desire? Why aren't you living the life you want? Do you know what you want? What kind of life do you think you deserve? Do you feel like you aren't getting the answers you seek? The good news is that you already have all the answers you need! All you need is the courage to answer the powerful questions and to allow yourself into your own heart for the answers! Listen as Christopher welcomes Trish Bishop to the show for a conversation on her book 'The Question Journey', how to allow more freedom into your life and ways on how you expand your own feelings and allow them to manifest into what you've always wanted. Don't miss this special evening with Christopher and Trish!

item.description:
Most of us pray every single day to our Higher Power, our beautiful and divine Mother & Father God. Do you sometimes feel that you are not connecting or that your connection with God is weaker than other peoples? Do you think God is mad or upset with you? Listen as I share some ways and exercises on how you can glorify God everyday (just like the Angels do!) and how you can receive messages from God, not to mention healing and endless blessings from our Divine Creator as well. Your calls and questions on the topic and much more!

item.title: BEING EMPATHIC & USING YOUR SENSES TO HELP OTHERS w/ PSYCHIC & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Aug 29,2009
item.description:
Are you an empath? Empathic lightworkers are amazing souls who use so much of their daily energies to help others along this difficult task we call life. Being empathic, in addition to using your psychic ability and intuition, you can help others by sensing their emotions and getting a deeper picture of their situation to better help them. Being empathic also allows us to be more sensitive to most people and situations because we can 'see' and 'sense' the full picture. Listen as I talk about being an empath, how you can strengthen your empathic senses, and ways to broaden your spirituality by giving the universe permission to use your body as a spiritual instrument of divine light to help others! Your calls and questions on the topic and much more!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES CELEBRATED PSYCHIC MEDIUM LISA WILLIAMS TO THE SHOW! - Aug 19,2009
item.description:
Celebrated Psychic Medium Lisa Williams Star of Lifetime TV's 'Lisa Williams: Voices from the Other Side' and also 'Lisa Williams: Life Among the Dead' When Lisa Williams was a little girl, she discovered she had a gift. Communicating with those who are no longer with us. Some people say what she does is scary other people say she change their lives. Lisa just says what she hears and sees and she sees a lot. Lisa's personal 'spiritual' journey has been an exciting and rewarding one. She had to go through many life-changing experiences to understand what her calling was in life. Lisa is also a healer and works along side the medical profession to aid the healing process. Lisa Williams is now able to share her gifts with you through large audience readings on her various lecture tours and her new TV show, Lisa Williams: Voices from the Other Side and also Lisa Williams: Life Among the Dead. Join Christopher as he welcomes Lisa Williams on the show for what promises to be an amazing and powerful conversation!

item.title: TIME TRAVEL & EXPLORING PAST LIVES WITH PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Aug 15,2009
item.description:
What would you do if you could travel back in time or travel to a time in future? Travel back to the Civil War or back to days when Indians first roamed the land. Time travel can also be useful to explore your past lives and exploring different eras of the past that influence you now or that you have interest in. Listen in as I answer your questions and share some experiences and exercises on time travel and how you can explore your past lives. All calls and questions and more!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES ANGELIC MEDIUM ALLIE CHESLICK TO THE SHOW! - Aug 15,2009
item.description:
So many words can be used when describing Allie Cheslick: Psychic Intuitive, Spiritual Medium, Life Coach, Radio Show Host and Producer, Health & Wellness Advocate, Author, Spiritual Teacher, Paranormal Investigator, Business Consultant and Dear Friend are just a few that come to my mind. Allie has been changing people's lives for the past 21 years and has read for people from all walks of life, including celebrities, authors, professional mediums and psychics, metaphysical practitioners, doctors, lawyers, housewives, bereavement groups, clergy, corporate presidents and chief executive officers, everyday hardworking people, young and old alike and continues to do this work with Love, Gratitude and Respect, Embracing all of the experiences with Divine Love. Allie Cheslick is currently in the process of writing her book, called, " Blessings in Disguise " an adaptation of an abused soul. Allie can be heard weekly on her radio show on BlogTalkRadio, 'Wings of Love'. Join me as I welcome my dear friend Allie Cheslick to the show for the very first time, in an exciting and powerful segment, as I interview her on her life, spiritual mission, current projects and what she wants every spiritual person in the universe to know! Don't miss this show! As two friends get together to live, love, laugh and learn! Join me and Allie for an evening that will touch your heart and tickle your funny bone!

item.description:
Everyone is born psychic, though not everyone is destined to become one. There are exercises and routines that I'd like to share with you on how you can reactivate the psychic strength that you came into this lifetime with. If you want to use your psychic gifts to help the universe, listen as I share some ways on how you can increase your intuition and your psychic awareness. I'll answer your questions and much more!

item.title: SOULFUL LOVE: AN ENCHANTED EVENING WITH CHRISTOPHER REBURN & NANCY HOWRY - Aug 08,2009
item.description:
She's one of the most popular guests I have frequently on my show, so why not do a monthly show together exploring love and relationships? Join me and bestselling romance author Nancy Howry each month on 'Soulful Love' a new show where we explore love and relationships and the true meaning of love! During this show, we'll discuss what it takes to prepare to meet your soulmate and finding your soulmate. Some tips and techniques on how you can get through some of your personal goals in order to have more room in your life for a soulmate, and why sometimes it feels like it's taking forever to find him/her!! Your questions and more!

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN WELCOMES SPIRITUAL AUTHOR WD ALLAN TO THE SHOW - Aug 01,2009
item.description:
Spirituality For The Moment is a new and innovative look into the many facets of peoples beliefs in anything tied to their thought and places definitive thinking into a completely varied perspective for the reader. The author asks questions of these themes in a wide ranging attempt to spark both the reader's thoughts with regard to these personal sense of spirituality in their lives. This vision of growth, change and betterment takes an inclusive look at many different themes of spiritual different spiritual principles as well as using the facilitator of the open-ended question as a means to help bring the reader to their own conclusions of these varied yet all encompassing concepts of belief. The book's authur, W.D. Allan, spends his time writing and helping people as much as he can, and has dedicated himself to the pursuits of seeking spiritual ideals as a way of life and of helping others to do the same whenever anyone seeks such a discussion in their life. Today he motivates people through a positive sense of spiritualism and entertains the possibilities of helping people as a group speaker. He can be reached by submitting a request for contact through his website, www.spiritualitymoment.com associated with his book series Spirituality For The Moment. Join Christopher as he welcomes his good friend WD Allan to the show for a conversation on 'Spirituality For The Moment', WD Allan's spiritual plans for the future, the current state of spirituality and the new age arena and much more. Don't miss what will be one very powerful episode!

Christopher Reburn | WD Allan | Spirituality For The Moment | Spiritual Author | Spirituality

item.title: WORLD RENOWNED AUTHOR, SPIRITUAL TEACHER & INTUITIVE GUIDE SONIA CHOQUETTE - Jul 31,2009
item.description:
Sonia Choquette is an internationally acclaimed spiritual teacher, intuitive guide and masterful catalyst whose special gift is to energetically activate the highest vibration and free the authentic Spirit in everyone she meets. She releases people from the restriction and fear of the ego and guides them through the portals to joy, wholeness, and personal empowerment in every area of their life. She has also been a personal Intuitive advisor to such New Age Leaders as Louise Hay, Julia Cameron, Caroline Myss, Dr. Wayne Dyer, pop icon Billy Corgan of the Smashing Pumpkins rock band, and professional consultant to international business leaders such as Charlotte Beers, Fortune 500 Company CEO. A third generation intuitive and prolific writer, her books have sold over a million copies worldwide including her NY Times Bestseller The Answer Is Simple.... Love Yourself, Live Your Spirit. Sonia is passionate, dynamic, powerful, and direct in her ability to instantly liberate people from the limitations and fears (a five-sensory life) and leads them to create a far more effective, spirit guided (six sensory) successful life which she insists is “our natural way.” Using her highly developed, finely tuned intuitive skills she can instantly identify self sabotaging patterns and life obstacles and guide people past them and directly onto success in all their goals. No-nonsense, to-the point, practical, down–to–earth, and often hilarious in her delivery, Sonia’s intuitive gifts and engaging Spirit inspire even the most cynical. Sonia has been a regular guest on ABC, NBC, CNN, FOX, Lime, Sirius, and WGN as well as featured in numerous magazines and publications. Join Christopher as he welcomes Sonia to the show for an exciting conversation on her life as a spiritual teacher and intuitive, her current and future projects and much more!

Sonia Choquette | Christopher Reburn | The Answer is Simple | Spiritual Teacher | Ask Your Guides

item.title: 'PSYCHIC CHILDREN: A GUIDE IN HELPING THE YOUNG & GIFTED' CD RELEASE PARTY with CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jul 31,2009
item.description:
Psychic Children: A Guide In Helping The Young & Gifted is geared toward parents, families and friends who have psychic and spiritually gifted children and younger adults in their life and spiritual circle of Light who have been blessed with beautiful gifts from above. Christopher recounts some of his very first memories and experiences with his own gifts growing up -- some of which he's never spoke of until now -- and offers practical ways in helping and guiding the young and gifted, as well as highlighting some ways and exercises that can help awaken and manifest psychic and healing ability in children and young adults as they mature. We are all born psychic, but not everyone retains the full effect and strength of their gifts as they get older, Christopher shares ways to re-ignite the gifts of the younger and older generation which can restore the original incarnated strength and power of them in this very powerful audio CD project. Christopher also speaks about why children come into life so incredibly gifted, and what life is like on The Other Side for them before they are born that makes them so gifted and spiritually oriented, and much more. This project has just been released and is now available! Order your digital copy of Christopher's new CD for $10 by visiting his website at http://www.reburn.org If you'd like an actual hardcopy CD, the cost is $15 and the CD comes to you signed from Christopher and other goodies. Hardcopy CD's are available in the store at http://www.thepsychicspirit.com/store.html Listen as Christopher talks about the new CD and about Psychic Children and gifted young adults. What's a party without prizes? You guessed it -- there will be some free CD giveaways!

Christopher Reburn | Psychic Children | Gifted Children | Gifted Young Adults | Spirituality in Children

item.title: OVERCOMING PAST LIFE TRAUMA WITH PSYCHIC MEDIUM & SPIRITUAL TEACHER CHRISTOPHER REBURN - Jul 26,2009
item.description:
Past Lives are very important. One thing that some people don't understand is that we bring in alot of past life energy from our previous lives. Sometimes this is good, especially when we bring in alot of strength and courage from past lives. It can be very troubling when we bring in emotional attachments from past lives, and energy that makes us troubled and insecure in this current lifetime. Do you have have past life trauma around? Listen as I share some techniques on how you can remove past life trauma from your Spirit and advance more spiritually in this current lifetime. I'll be talking more about past lives and answering your questions!

Christopher Reburn | Past Life Trauma | Past Lives | Overcoming Fears | Spirituality

item.title: BEHIND THE SCENES OF A HAUNTING INVESTIGATION w/ CHRISTOPHER REBURN & PRRS FOUNDER JENNY STEWART - Jul 25,2009
item.description:
Join us for a very special evening as I welcome my good friend, founder of the Paranormal Research & Resource Society (PRRS) Jenny Stewart back to the show. Listen as we take you behind the scenes of a haunting investigation, how to do an EVP (Electronic Voice Phenomena), how to record Ghosts & Spirits, the do's and dont's of a haunting investigation and lots more! We'll be taking your calls and answering your questions on the topic! It's always a pleasure when I have Jenny on the show, and I hope you'll join us for an evening of paranormal exploration.

item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN's NEW 'PSYCHIC CHILDREN' CD JUST RELEASED! REBURN AVAILABLE FOR MEDIA INTERVIEWS - Jul 25,2009
item.description:
Psychic Children: A Guide In Helping The Young & Gifted is geared toward parents, families and friends who have psychic and spiritually gifted children and younger adults in their life and spiritual circle of Light who have been blessed with beautiful gifts from above. Christopher recounts some of his very first memories and experiences with his own gifts growing up -- some of which he's never spoke of until now -- and offers practical ways in helping and guiding the young and gifted, as well as highlighting some ways and exercises that can help awaken and manifest psychic and healing ability in children and young adults as they mature. We are all born psychic, but not everyone retains the full effect and strength of their gifts as they get older, Christopher shares ways to re-ignite the gifts of the younger and older generation which can restore the original incarnated strength and power of them in this very powerful audio CD project. Christopher also speaks about why children come into life so incredibly gifted, and what life is like on The Other Side for them before they are born that makes them so gifted and spiritually oriented, and much more.

This project has just been released and is now available! Order your digital copy of Christopher's new CD for $10 by visiting his website at http://www.reburn.org If you'd like an actual hardcopy CD, the cost is $15 and the CD comes to you signed from Christopher and other goodies. Hardcopy CD's are available in the store at http://www.thepsychicspirit.com/store.html

Christopher is also available for media interviews on his latest CD. If you are a TV or radio show host or producer and would like to have Christopher on your show to talk about his new CD and about Psychic Children, please email your request to ThePsychicSpirit@aol.com
 
Have a blessed day!

If we get up in the morning and start sneezing and say out loud 'Well, I guess I'm sick!' our mind and bodys hears that, and guess what? We get sick with a cold or something. item.title: CHRISTOPHER REBURN TERRORIST ATTACK PREDICTION VALIDATED TODAY - May 21,2009
item.description:
PREDICTION VALIDATED

Part of Christopher's 2009 predictions that were released in 
November 2008 included the following:
 

'Terrorist attacks in 2009: I do see there being about three terrorist attacks in 2009, including one attempt in the United States, but I do feel as though it will not go as planned. I am really worried about London, Germany and India still (I’ve made so many accurate predictions on those three area in the last decade that have come true) and I do feel that terrorists are still plotting and planning and focusing on those areas.'


Some of this prediction was validated on 11/26/08 when scores of people were killed in Mumbai rampage - CNN.com More of this prediction was validated today 5/21/09 when the FBI arrested four people in alleged plot to bomb Bronx synagogues and
shoot down a plane.
http://www.nydailynews.com/news/ny_crime/2009/05/20/2009-05-20_fbi_arrest_four_in_alleged_plot_to_car_bomb_bronx_synagogue.html

item.description:

In August 2008, Ms. Howry released 'The Souls of My Feet' to rave reviews and the book has since become an international success and has garned her respect from readers worldwide. item.title: CHRISTOPHER & FRIENDS CELEBRATE TWO YEAR ANNIVERSARY OF 'CONVERSATIONS WITH CHRISTOPHER' - Apr 07,2009
item.description:
Two years ago today, Christopher's radio show made it's exciting debut. Two years later, the show continues to reach new listeners in every part of the world each week with thought provoking spiritual, new age and metaphysical topics. Join Christopher and some good friends -- Animal Communicator Diana Romans, Reiki Healer Shirley, Bestselling Author Nancy Howry, Animal Communicator & Intuitive Healer Bobbi and Lightworker & Healer Mary K -- for this special airing where we come together and celebrate the show. Call in and share with Christopher how his show has helped you or touched your life. What's a party without prizes? There will be a number of on-air giveaways and surprises that you've got to listen in to win and be part of. 'Conversations with Christopher' continues to be a strong force in the spiritual world and has become a fan favorite show throughout the world. Mark your calendars and be part of this historical night as we celebrate the show's two year anniversary, and many more!

Christopher Reburn | Psychic Medium | Healer | Spiritual Teacher | Spirituality

item.title: ANNA NICOLE SMITH BESTSELLING AUTHOR & BEST FRIEND MELISSA BYRUM RETURNS TO THE SHOW - Mar 28,2009
item.description:
BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND! Ms. Byrum returns to the show following her January 2009 appearance to talk more about her book and friendship with Anna Nicole Smith. Melissa wrote the book 'When You Wished Upon A Star' all about her friendship with the legendary model and controversial internationally known celebrity. Finally -- the public can get a rare glimpse into the life of the young woman who wanted to be a star, and whose life was cut short entirely too soon in this highly emotional and entertaining book. Anna Nicole Smith was one of those rare gems who appealed to most people, if not for her beauty, than for her advocacy with so many charities and worthwhile causes. Don't miss this powerful segment with Christopher and Melissa as she talks about what it was like being best friends with Anna Nicole Smith and much more.

item.description:

item.description:
KINGSLEY O'DELL
1922-2008
On the morning of December 25, Christopher experienced the tragic loss of his beloved grandfather. He asks for prayers and healing for him and the family so that everyone may get through this very sad and devastating time.  No further readings will be done until at some point in January to be determined at a later date. Prayers, healing and positive energy to help Christopher and family cope with this loss is greatly appreciated during this very difficult and upsetting time.

item.title: ATTENTION RADIO SHOW HOSTS & SHOW PRODUCERS -- Want Christopher on your show? - Sep 13,2008
item.description:
Thank you to everyone who has requested interviews and segments where you've wanted to feature Christopher Reburn on your show. Because Christopher's schedule is hectic with his active reading and touring schedule, he is not able to personally accomodate every request that comes in. 

'A ratings booster' is what many radio show hosts and producers call Christopher Reburn. Whenever the famous psychic appears on air, he brings his thousands of worldwide loyal fans, followers and friends with him. Christopher's demographic is everyone and everybody, as he makes himself available to everyone and everybody and reaches out to thousands of new listeners each week on his own highly successful radio show, 'Conversations with Christopher'. While Christopher is one of the more sought after and leading psychics in the world, he continues to make himself available to all walks of life.

Would you like to feature Christopher Reburn on your show? If so, keep reading! 

When Christopher does appear on radio shows worldwide, the show goes something like this:

First Segment: An Introduction to Christopher where he talks about his life in growing up psychic and being spiritual, his first-ever psychic experiences, as well as his years of psychic and spiritual research into Dreams, Angels, Spirit Guides, The Other Side, Mother & Father God, The After Life and much more. 

Second Segment: Interviewing Christopher where the host or producer interviews Christopher about his work, predictions, discusses Christopher's life and career as a leading psychic, current & future projects, spiritual topics, etc.

Final Segment generally includes a brief Spirituality Q&A session with your listeners . During this final segment, Christopher can also do a very spiritual and soul cleansing meditation.

Christopher is available to do half hour segments as well as one hour segments. All requests that come are are given a full review and a formal decision will be made within 72 hours if your show is suitable for Christopher, and if the date(s) you are requesting is/are available. If you'd like to request an interview and feature Christopher on your show, please email Derrick@ThePsychicSpirit.com for more information. Serious inquiries and professional talk show hosts only!

Christopher Reburn | Psychic | Spiritual | Spirituality | Angels | Spirit Guides | Radio Show Hosts | Radio Show Guests | Radio Producers | Executives

item.title: Giving Thanks To Our Spirit Guides & Angels with Psychic Christopher Reburn - Dec 08,2007
item.description:
*RESCHEDULED FROM 12/1/07* This time of year we always love to give back to our family and friends, and enjoy some of the same treatment in return. Sometimes we do unintentionally forget those who help us out the most -- who protect us, guide us and embrace us -- Our Spirit Guides & Angels. item.title: Christopher Reburn's Official Website www.thepsychicspirit.com // Scheduling a Private Reading with - Oct 13,2007
item.description:
Want to schedule a private reading with Christopher Reburn? Surf on over to his Official Website at www.thepsychicspirit.com or send us an email to ThePsychicSpirit@aol.com and we'll answer any questions you may have about Christopher and we'll get you confirmed for a reading as soon as possible!

Please note: Christopher's telephone reading schedule does book up about 4-6 weeks in advances. However, for emergencies, Christopher does put aside a limited number of daily readings for those who need a reading right away. Christopher also offers Email Readings which offer a 24-48 hour turnaround time! If you are looking for a reading within the next 24-48 hours, you'd want to do an Emergency Reading or an Email Reading with Christopher.
